Animal Crossing - Happy Home Designer (U.name: 動物之森-快樂家居設計師解密
Animal Crossing - Happy Home Designer (U.original_desc:
Show off your style by designing homes for all of your favorite Animal Crossing villagers! Use your creativity to design the perfect houses - inside and out - for both old and new friends. With the new amiibo cards, you can call your favorite villagers into the game.
Features:
Design the interior and exterior of hundreds of homes for animal villagers
Leave your decorative touch on the school, hospital and other public facilities
Collect and Connect - Collect and share amiibo cards of your favorite villagers, and invite them into your game
Tap amiibo cards to invite up to four characters into a room to hang out
Tap the amiibo cards of special characters to call in animals that would otherwise not appear in your game with requests
Animal Crossing - Happy Home Designer (U.desc:
為所有你最喜歡的《動物之森》村民設計家園，展示你的風格！發揮您的創造力，為新老朋友設計從內到外的完美房屋。使用新的 amiibo 卡，您可以召喚您最喜歡的村民進入遊戲。
特點：
為動物村民設計數百個房屋的內部和外部
為學校、醫院和其他公共設施留下您的裝飾風格
收集並連接 - 收集並分享您最喜歡的村民的 amiibo 卡，並邀請他們加入您的遊戲
點擊 amiibo 卡可邀請最多四個角色進入房間閒逛
點擊特殊角色的 amiibo 卡來召喚那些不會出現在遊戲中的動物

Hello Kitty Happy Happy Family (Europe).name: Hello Kitty 幸福快樂的家庭
Hello Kitty Happy Happy Family (Europe).original_desc:
Play with Kitty and her entire family.
Learn while having fun with 25 entertaining workshops.
Collect hundreds of images and disguises for Kitty and Mimmy!
Hello Kitty Happy Happy Family (Europe).desc:
與凱蒂和她的全家人一起玩耍。
通過 25 個有趣的研討會，邊學習邊享受樂趣。
為凱蒂和咪咪收集數百張圖像和偽裝！

Poochy & Yoshi's Woolly World (USA).name: 波奇和耀西的羊毛世界
Poochy & Yoshi's Woolly World (USA).original_desc:
Discover a handicraft world bursting at the seams with creativity, as you guide Yarn Yoshi or Yarn Poochy through clever side-scrolling stages. Unravel secrets, toss yarn to weave platforms, and power up with woolly transformations. All stages from the Wii U version are joined by new ones starring Poochy and more Nintendo 3DS exclusive features!
It's a mad dash for beads in new Poochy stages: dodge stumps, mush down snowy paths, chase Lakitu, and unearth hidden paths and items. Sniffing out secrets is always a charm in Mellow Mode, thanks to the curious Poochy Pups. As you find collectables, you'll unlock rewards, from extra stages to new Patterned Yoshi. You can also design and play as your very own Yarn Yoshi, or share it with friends via the StreetPass function! When you want a break from exploring, peek into the lives of Yarn Poochy and Yarn Yoshi in 30 hilarious stop-motion shorts. It's time to get crafty!
Poochy & Yoshi's Woolly World (USA).desc:
當您引導 Yarn Yoshi 或 Yarn Poochy 通過巧妙的橫向捲軸關卡時，探索充滿創意的手工藝世界。解開秘密，將紗線扔到編織平台上，並通過羊毛變形來增強力量。Wii U 版本的所有關卡均加入了由 Poochy 主演的新關卡以及更多 Nintendo 3DS 獨有功能！
在新的 Poochy 關卡中，這是一次瘋狂的珠子衝刺：躲避樹樁，衝破雪路，追逐拉基圖，並挖掘隱藏的路徑和物品。在柔和模式中，嗅出秘密始終是一種魅力，這要歸功於好奇的 Poochy Pups。當你找到收藏品時，你將解鎖獎勵，從額外的階段到新的圖案耀西。您還可以設計並扮演您自己的 Yarn Yoshi，或通過 StreetPass 功能與朋友分享！如果您想在探索之餘休息一下，可以通過 30 部搞笑的定格動畫短片來了解 Yarn Poochy 和 Yarn Yoshi 的生活。是時候變得狡猾了！

Professor Layton and the Miracle Mask (E.key: Professor Layton and the Miracle Mask (Europe)
Professor Layton and the Miracle Mask (E.original_name: Professor Layton and the Miracle Mask (Europe)
Professor Layton and the Miracle Mask (E.name: 雷頓教授與奇蹟假面
Professor Layton and the Miracle Mask (E.original_desc:
Professor Layton and Luke head to the town of miracles, Montdol, in search of the Mask of Miracle. The mask has the ability to grant wishes to its wearer. Layton and Luke arrive at the town to see they are too late, as a mysterious man is using the power of the mask to turn people to stone. Layton and Luke task themselves with solving the mystery of Montdol and the Mask of Miracles.
This fifth game in the Professor Layton series makes more use of the physical button controls for puzzle-solving as opposed to just the touchscreen. To take advantage of the hardware capabilities of the Nintendo 3DS, the characters are rendered in polygons outside of cutscenes, as opposed to sprites, in addition to other polishings of the interface.
Beside the regular adventure where you traverse the town, talk to the characters and solve puzzles, there are several mini-games that get gradually unlocked as you play and find the unlockable items:
 Bunny - after a while, you will stumble upon a circus bunny that isn't performing well and decide to help it along. This will require constant training of new moves which will become available over time as you acquire them. After you teach the bunny new moves, you will be able to instruct it to use those moves during the theatrical performances. Theatrical performances consist of a director telling you what the story is about and what he wants to see in each scene, and you will have to instruct bunny to act accordingly, providing you have taught it the moves necessary to perform the full play.
 Robot - after you acquire a toy robot from one of the street vendors, you will be able to play levels that will become gradually available. Levels are rectangular in shape and you can move your robot left, right, up or down through the field of squares. Each movement uses some of the battery and you have to reach the end square before the battery depletes which still gives you a lot of time for trial and error. Single movement will move your robot by three steps unless it bumps into a wall or picks up some special items that may temporarily boost its power to eat through the wall and enemies that move in pre-defined patterns.
 Shop - helping the friend in need, as a true gentleman, this mini-game will let you order the items in the store so that when customer comes to buy what he or she wants, the rest of the items also catch his/her eye and in turn you end up selling all your wares. Base item is initially set in the store, and you can place other items only adjacent to already placed items in the store. What will catch the eye of the customer after purchasing some item is the adjacent item that is either of the same type or of the same color. Placing two similar items might confuse the customer due to ambiguity which may lead the customer to stop buying after a while if the net remaining adjacent item has no connection to the last item he or she purchased.
Beside mini-games there are many collectible items you can find during your exploration and some of the flashback sub-stories become available after certain key events which can then be watched as short episodes where characters vary from event to event, and might not even be one of the leading three characters.
Professor Layton and the Miracle Mask (E.desc:
雷頓教授和盧克前往奇蹟小鎮蒙多爾尋找奇蹟面具。面具有能力實現佩戴者的願望。雷頓和盧克到達小鎮後發現為時已晚，一名神秘男子正在利用面具的力量將人們變成石頭。雷頓和盧克的任務是解開蒙多爾之謎和奇蹟面具。
《雷頓教授》系列的第五款遊戲更多地使用物理按鈕控制來解決謎題，而不僅僅是觸摸屏。為了利用任天堂 3DS 的硬件功能，除了界面的其他改進之外，角色還以多邊形（而不是精靈）的方式在過場動畫之外渲染。
除了穿越城鎮、與角色交談和解決謎題的常規冒險之外，還有一些小遊戲會在您玩遊戲並找到可解鎖物品時逐漸解鎖：
兔子 - 過了一段時間，你會偶然發現一隻表現不佳的馬戲團兔子，並決定幫助它。這將需要不斷地訓練新的動作，隨著時間的推移，當你掌握它們時，這些動作就會變得可用。教兔子新動作後，您將能夠指導它在戲劇表演中使用這些動作。戲劇表演包括導演告訴你故事的內容以及他想在每個場景中看到的內容，你必須指導兔子做出相應的動作，前提是你已經教了它執行完整戲劇所需的動作。
機器人 - 當你從街頭小販那裡獲得一個玩具機器人後，你將能夠玩逐漸可用的關卡。關卡呈矩形，您可以在正方形區域內向左、向右、向上或向下移動機器人。每個動作都會消耗一些電池，你必須在電池耗盡之前到達終點，這仍然給你大量的時間進行嘗試和錯誤。單次移動將使您的機器人移動三步，除非它撞到牆壁或拾取一些特殊物品，這些物品可能會暫時增強其吃穿牆壁和以預定義模式移動的敵人的能力。
商店 - 幫助有需要的朋友，作為一個真正的紳士，這個小遊戲會讓你在商店裡訂購物品，這樣當顧客來購買他或她想要的東西時，其餘的物品也會吸引他或她的注意，反過來你最終會賣掉你所有的商品。基礎物品最初是在商店中設置的，您只能將其他物品放置在與商店中已放置的物品相鄰的位置。購買某件商品後，最能吸引顧客注意的是相鄰的同類或相同顏色的商品。放置兩個相似的商品可能會由於含糊不清而使顧客感到困惑，如果淨剩餘的相鄰商品與他或她購買的最後一個商品沒有聯繫，這可能會導致顧客在一段時間後停止購買。
除了迷你游戲之外，您在探索過程中還可以找到許多可收藏的物品，並且在某些關鍵事件之後可以使用一些閃回子故事，然後可以將其作為短集觀看，其中角色因事件而異，甚至可能不是主要的三個角色之一。

Project X Zone (USA).name: 最终幻想X
Project X Zone (USA).original_desc: Developed by Banpresto and Monolith Soft, Project X Zone features over 50 characters from 29 historic game franchises by three of Japan's most prolific video game companies. In Project X Zone players will use a team of two characters known as a Pair Unit to explore the world within the game. An additional character known as a Solo Unit can be combined with the Pair Unit to assist in battles with Solo Attacks as well as augment the attacks available for players to execute. Throughout the game, epic battles are waiting to erupt at a moment's notice. Players will have to master an array of screen-busting moves including Solo Attacks, Support Attacks, Cross Hits, and Finishing Moves in order to defeat a multitude of foes
Project X Zone (USA).desc: Project X Zone 由 Banpresto 和 Monolith Soft 開發，擁有來自日本最多產的三個視頻遊戲公司的 29 個歷史遊戲系列的 50 多個角色。在 Project X Zone 中，玩家將使用兩個角色組成的團隊（稱為“配對單位”）來探索遊戲中的世界。稱為單人單位的附加角色可以與配對單位組合，以協助單人攻擊的戰鬥，並增強玩家可以執行的攻擊。在整個遊戲中，史詩般的戰鬥隨時可能爆發。玩家必須掌握一系列破壞屏幕的動作，包括單人攻擊、支援攻擊、交叉攻擊和終結動作，才能擊敗眾多敵人

Project X Zone 2 (USA).name: 最终幻想X
Project X Zone 2 (USA).original_desc: In the sequel to the original world-crossing RPG adventure, legendary characters from Japan's most prolific video game publishers come together to create the biggest mash-up strategy game ever! Project X Zone 2 gives gamers the opportunity to play as their favorite characters from a multitude of franchises and form teams of characters hailing from classic and current franchises and engage enemies through strategic turn-based battles.
Project X Zone 2 (USA).desc: 在原創跨界 RPG 冒險的續集中，來自日本最多產的視頻遊戲發行商的傳奇人物齊聚一堂，創造了有史以來最大的混搭策略遊戲！Project X Zone 2 讓玩家有機會扮演眾多系列中他們最喜歡的角色，並組建來自經典和當前系列的角色團隊，並通過戰略回合製戰鬥與敵人交戰。

Puzzler World 2012 3D (USA).name: 益智世界 2012 3D
Puzzler World 2012 3D (USA).original_desc: With Puzzler World 2012 3D, players can collect trophies in a personal trophy cabinet as proof of skill, collect hint tokens for help on tricky clues and puzzles, and teach the game to remember individual letters and numbers using the handwriting recognition feature. Add more variety and hours of fun by unlocking bonus games with new modes. Take on additional bonus games such as Hangman, Chain Letters, Missing Piece, and more with Challenge mode. For an extra challenge, unlock Master mode puzzles to reveal a broad range of even tougher puzzles.
Puzzler World 2012 3D (USA).desc: 借助 Puzzler World 2012 3D，玩家可以在個人獎杯櫃中收集獎杯作為技能證明，收集提示標記以幫助解決棘手的線索和謎題，並教遊戲使用手寫識別功能記住單個字母和數字。通過使用新模式解鎖獎勵遊戲來增加更多的多樣性和更多的樂趣。通過挑戰模式進行額外的獎勵遊戲，例如絞刑吏、連環信、失踪的碎片等等。如需額外挑戰，請解鎖大師模式謎題，以揭示各種更難的謎題。

Puzzler World 2013 (USA).name: 益智世界 2013
Puzzler World 2013 (USA).original_desc:
Puzzler World 2013 features over 1,200 brain teasing puzzles and introduces new games such as Maze-a-Pix, Number Jig and Loko.
 
Puzzler World 2013 takes Master Mode even further with new, tougher challenge that the player can unlock and test themselves against.
Puzzler World 2013 (USA).desc:
Puzzler World 2013 包含 1,200 多個腦筋急轉彎謎題，並推出了 Maze-a-Pix、Number Jig 和 Loko 等新遊戲。

Puzzler World 2013 進一步推進了大師模式，推出了新的、更艱鉅的挑戰，玩家可以解鎖並測試自己。

Rabbids - Travel in Time 3D (USA).name: 瘋狂兔子 - 時空旅行 3D
Rabbids - Travel in Time 3D (USA).original_desc: Rabbids are bwaaack and this time they have an infallible plan: travel back in time and invade human history! Plunge into the past with the wacky Rabbids and revisit the greatest moments of history like the discovery of fire, the broken nose of the Sphinx or the legend of Arthur. Uncover how Rabbids wreaked havoc and changed the course of history...
Rabbids - Travel in Time 3D (USA).desc: 兔子們瘋了，這一次他們有一個萬無一失的計劃：回到過去併入侵人類歷史！與古怪的瘋兔一起沉浸在過去，重溫歷史上最偉大的時刻，比如火的發現、獅身人面像的斷鼻子或亞瑟的傳說。揭開瘋狂兔子如何造成嚴重破壞並改變歷史進程......

Rhythm Paradise Megamix (Europe).name: 節奏天堂超級混音
Rhythm Paradise Megamix (Europe).original_desc:
Rhythmic gaming bliss, goats eating turnips, and the funkiest tunes you?ve ever bashed a button to? This must be the Rhythm Heaven? Megamix. With 70+ rhythm games, including new ones, remixed fan-favorites, and US debuts, this fresh mix has it all. Try to reach Heaven World as you stab viruses, feed a bear, and more! Just don't miss a beat.
As you dig into each hilariously random activity, you'll get pulled into the world of Rhythm Heaven by the riveting soundtrack, created with help from legendary music producer, Tsunku?. Hang out in a café to check out new rhythm games and chat with a drink-serving dog. Or feed your pet goat using a turnip-powered game machine! You can even visit a museum to enjoy the game's music and artwork. In the party mood? Then team up with three other players to take down challenges. Every time you encounter a player via the StreetPass? feature, you'll do battle with their punching robot. It's time to kick back! Heaven World is just a few head bops away.
Rhythm Paradise Megamix (Europe).desc:
有節奏的遊戲樂趣，山羊吃蘿蔔，還有你按下按鈕聽過的最時髦的曲調？這裡一定是節奏天堂吧？超級混音。這個新鮮的組合擁有 70 多款節奏遊戲，包括新遊戲、粉絲最愛的混音遊戲以及美國首發遊戲。嘗試到達天堂世界，刺殺病毒、餵熊等等！只是不要錯過任何一個節拍。
當你深入研究每一個搞笑的隨機活動時，你會被傳奇音樂製作人 Tsunku? 幫助創作的引人入勝的配樂帶入節奏天堂的世界。在咖啡館裡閒逛，看看新的節奏遊戲，並與一隻送飲料的狗聊天。或者使用蘿蔔驅動的遊戲機餵養您的寵物山羊！您甚至可以參觀博物館，欣賞遊戲的音樂和藝術作品。聚會氣氛？然後與其他三名玩家組隊應對挑戰。每次您通過 StreetPass 遇到玩家時？功能，你將與他們的拳擊機器人進行戰鬥。是時候反擊了！天堂世界距離酒店僅幾步之遙。

Rhythm Thief & the Emperor's Treasure (U.name: 節奏竊賊與皇帝的寶藏
Rhythm Thief & the Emperor's Treasure (U.original_desc:
Raphael, a normal boy by day, acts as the legendary art thief Phantom R by night. He is well-known for stealing precious paintings and returning them days later, never getting caught. His true motive can be traced back three years prior to the start of the game, where Raphael's father mysteriously disappeared and left him with a strange coin. Raphael found all of the paintings his father had stolen shortly afterward, replacing them with forgeries. As Phantom R, Raphael works to replace his father's forgeries with the original artworks, meanwhile hoping he will someday find his father again. 
At the start of the game, Raphael finds a lead in the form of a museum exhibit which is currently displaying a bracelet with the same symbol as that on his father's coin. As Phantom R publicly announces his intention to steal the bracelet, Raphael must deal with the unraveling of a mystery involving a hostile man who claims to be the historical Napoleon, a mysterious girl named Marie who seems to have some connection to him, and the whereabouts of his very own father that may put him in over his head.
Rhythm Thief & the Emperor's Treasure is a mix of adventure and rhythm, following the story of a Parisian mystery. The player can explore various landmarks of Paris during their search for clues in a point-and-click style reminiscent of Professor Layton. Advancing through the plot may involve solving puzzles or, more frequently, completing a mini-game where Raphael must move to the beat. These games may make use of either the stylus or the gyroscope feature of the 3DS; depending on how closely the player has followed the rhythm, a letter rank will be given. Coins can be found throughout the city and used to buy items for use in a mini-game. Optional mini-games may also be found throughout the city, holding references to other SEGA franchises.
Rhythm Thief & the Emperor's Treasure (U.desc:
拉斐爾白天是一個普通男孩，晚上則扮演傳奇的藝術品竊賊 Phantom R。他因偷竊珍貴畫作並在幾天后歸還而從未被抓而聞名。他的真正動機可以追溯到遊戲開始前三年，拉斐爾的父親神秘失踪，並給他留下了一枚奇怪的硬幣。拉斐爾不久後發現了他父親偷來的所有畫作，並用贗品取代了它們。作為幻影 R，拉斐爾致力於用原創藝術品取代父親的贗品，同時希望有一天能再次找到父親。
遊戲開始時，拉斐爾以博物館展覽的形式找到了線索，該展覽目前正在展示一個手鐲，其符號與他父親的硬幣上的符號相同。當幻影 R 公開宣布他打算偷走手鐲時，拉斐爾必須解開一個謎團，其中涉及一個自稱是歷史上拿破崙的敵對男子、一個名叫瑪麗的神秘女孩，她似乎與他有某種聯繫，以及他自己的父親的下落，這可能會讓他陷入困境。
《節奏小偷與皇帝的寶藏》是冒險與節奏的結合，講述了巴黎的神秘故事。玩家可以通過點擊式的方式探索巴黎的各個地標，尋找線索，讓人想起雷頓教授。推進劇情可能涉及解決謎題，或者更常見的是完成一個拉斐爾必須跟上節拍的小遊戲。這些遊戲可能會使用 3DS 的手寫筆或陀螺儀功能；根據玩家跟隨節奏的程度，將給出字母排名。整個城市都可以找到硬幣，可以用來購買迷你游戲中使用的物品。整個城市還可以找到可選的迷你游戲，其中包含其他世嘉特許經營權的參考。

Rune Factory 4 (USA).name: 符文工廠4
Rune Factory 4 (USA).original_desc: Rune Factory 4 marks the return of the popular Harvest Moon spinoff that combines farming with dungeon adventuring. For the first time in the series, the player can select to play as a male or female hero, and potential suitors of either gender are also available in order to pursue love, marriage, and possibly a child. As the newly-appointed prince or princess, you can fulfill your royal duties of protecting the town from invaders, or take a more rural approach to governing by raising your own fruits and vegetables and helping townsfolk. Should some dungeon adventuring be on the days itinerary, you can select from the castles vast armament of swords, spears, and staffs along with magic for battle against dangerous foes, or even bring along a companion or friendly monster to aid you during your travels.
Rune Factory 4 (USA).desc: 《符文工廠 4》標誌著廣受歡迎的《牧場物語》衍生遊戲的回歸，該遊戲將農業與地下城冒險結合在一起。在該系列中，玩家第一次可以選擇扮演男性或女性英雄，並且也可以選擇任何性別的潛在追求者來追求愛情、婚姻，甚至可能是孩子。作為新任命的王子或公主，你可以履行保護城鎮免受入侵者的皇家職責，或者通過種植自己的水果和蔬菜並幫助城鎮居民，採取更鄉村的方式進行治理。如果當天的行程中有一些地下城冒險，您可以從城堡中選擇大量的武器，包括劍、矛和法杖以及魔法來對抗危險的敵人，甚至可以帶上一個同伴或友好的怪物來幫助您在旅途中。

Senran Kagura Burst (Europe).name: 閃亂神樂第一部
Senran Kagura Burst (Europe).original_desc: Senran Kagura Burst is an enhanced and updated version of the original Senran Kagura. It includes the complete original game, along with an entirely new scenario starring the rival Hebijo ninja team, which tells the original story from a different perspective. A number of new outfits and unlockable missions have also been added.
Senran Kagura Burst (Europe).desc: 閃亂神樂爆裂是原始閃亂神樂的增強和更新版本。它包括完整的原創遊戲，以及由對手 Hebijo 忍者隊主演的全新場景，從不同的角度講述原創故事。還添加了許多新服裝和可解鎖任務。

Shantae and the Pirates Curse (USA).name: 桑塔與海盜的詛咒
Shantae and the Pirates Curse (USA).original_desc: Embark on a brand new adventure with Shantae, the hair-whipping belly dancing genie! When Shantae loses her genie magic, she must team up with her nemesis, the nefarious pirate Risky Boots in order to save Sequin Land from evil. As a pirate, Shantae gains new weapons and tools to advance her quest, slay monsters, battle epic bosses ?and hopefully get her magic back in the bargain! But can she really trust her most deadly enemy?
Shantae and the Pirates Curse (USA).desc: 與甩頭髮的肚皮舞精靈桑塔一起踏上全新的冒險之旅！當桑塔失去精靈魔法時，她必須與她的宿敵、邪惡的海盜風險靴子聯手，以拯救亮片之地免受邪惡的侵害。作為一名海盜，桑塔獲得了新的武器和工具來推進她的任務、殺死怪物、與史詩般的頭目戰鬥——並希望能收回她的魔法！但她真的能相信她最致命的敵人嗎？

Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Summoner - So.key: Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Summoner - Soul Hackers (USA)
Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Summoner - So.original_name: Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Summoner - Soul Hackers (USA)
Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Summoner - So.name: 真女神轉生 - 惡魔召喚師 - 靈魂黑客
Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Summoner - So.original_desc: Soul Hackers delivers a first-person, dungeon-crawling RPG experience set in a future where technology and otherworldly forces meet in a macabre fusion of cyberpunk futurism and gothic horror. A first-person sci-fi RPG epic, Soul Hackers tells of a city held up as a beacon of humanity's triumph of technology, but with an infernal secret. In this would-be utopia, a group of hackers takes on a centuries-old mystic society, and a battle for control over humanity's fate is about to begin.
Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Summoner - So.desc: 《Soul Hackers》提供了第一人稱、地下城探索的角色扮演遊戲體驗，背景設定在未來，科技與超凡脫俗的力量相遇，賽博朋克未來主義與哥特式恐怖的可怕融合。《靈魂黑客》是一款第一人稱科幻角色扮演遊戲史詩，講述了一座被視為人類科技勝利燈塔的城市，但卻隱藏著一個地獄般的秘密。在這個未來的烏托邦中，一群黑客挑戰了一個有著數百年曆史的神秘社會，一場爭奪人類命運控制權的戰鬥即將開始。

Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Survivor Over.key: Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Survivor Overclocked (USA)
Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Survivor Over.original_name: Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Survivor Overclocked (USA)
Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Survivor Over.name: 真女神轉生 - 惡魔倖存者超頻
Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Survivor Over.original_desc: Expanded and enhanced, Devil Survivor Overclocked for Nintendo 3DS builds upon the game's original release with the addition of voice acting for the entirety of the game's lengthy, unconventional narrative. Moreover, that very story, already boasting multiple endings based on critical decisions by the player, now concludes with a special eighth chapter, a rousing epilogue for Shin Megami Tensei fans. The game's beautifully remastered hand drawn artwork and character portraits benefit from the new system's higher resolution screens, offering players a crisper, higher fidelity experience.
Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Survivor Over.desc: 任天堂 3DS 版《惡魔倖存者超頻》經過擴展和增強，以遊戲的原始版本為基礎，並為整個遊戲冗長、非傳統的敘述添加了配音。此外，這個故事已經擁有基於玩家關鍵決定的多個結局，現在以特殊的第八章結束，這是真女神轉生粉絲們激動人心的尾聲。遊戲精美重製的手繪藝術作品和人物肖像受益於新系統更高分辨率的屏幕，為玩家提供更清晰、更高保真度的體驗。

Shin Megami Tensei IV (USA).name: 新女神轉生醫生V
Shin Megami Tensei IV (USA).original_desc: Building on the styles of ATLUS' Persona, Devil Summoner, and Devil Survivor titles, SMTIV is the first true successor to 2004's Shin Megami Tensei: Nocturne. The story of SMTIV revolves around the Samurai, the sacred protectors of the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado. As a newly appointed Samurai, players will struggle with factions that have nefarious designs on the world as they defend their home kingdom from a growing army of demons. Decisions players make throughout the course of the story will have lasting repercussions, as the fate of the world hangs in the balance.
Shin Megami Tensei IV (USA).desc: SMTIV 以 ATLUS 的《女神異聞錄》、《惡魔召喚師》和《惡魔倖存者》遊戲的風格為基礎，是 2004 年《真女神轉生：夜曲》的第一個真正的繼承者。SMTIV 的故事圍繞東方天皇王國的神聖保護者武士展開。作為一名新任命的武士，玩家將與對世界懷有邪惡圖謀的派系進行鬥爭，同時保衛自己的祖國免受日益壯大的惡魔大軍的侵害。玩家在整個故事過程中做出的決定將產生持久的影響，因為世界的命運懸而未決。

Shinobi (Europe).name: 忍
Shinobi (Europe).original_desc: Betrayed by your friend you must battle an ancient and evil clan in this epic reboot of the acclaimed Shinobi series. Shinobi captures the classic side-scrolling action from the original Shinobi games. This coupled with intense combat in exotic locations and over the top boss encounters is what players have loved since the early days of the series.
Shinobi (Europe).desc: 在這部廣受好評的忍者係列的史詩重啟中，你被朋友背叛，必須與一個古老而邪惡的部落戰鬥。Shinobi 捕捉了原版 Shinobi 遊戲中的經典橫向捲軸動作。再加上異國情調的激烈戰鬥和頂級的 Boss 遭遇，是該系列早期以來玩家所喜愛的。

Shovel Knight (USA).name: 鏟子騎士
Shovel Knight (USA).original_desc:
Shovel Knight is a 2014 action platformer video game developed and published by independent developer Yacht Club Games for the Nintendo 3DS, Wii U, and personal computer platforms. The game was released worldwide on June 26, 2014. Shovel Knight was directed by former WayForward Technologies member Sean Velasco, and includes music composed by Jake Kaufman and Manami Matsumae.
Prior to the game, adventurers Shovel Knight and Shield Knight fought alongside one another, journeying across the world and seeking treasure. However, when the two explore the Tower of Fate, the two fall to the dark magic power of a cursed amulet. When Shovel Knight reawakens, the Tower has been sealed and Shield Knight is nowhere to be seen. Grieving for his beloved, Shovel Knight gives up adventuring and secludes himself. However, during his absence, the Enchantress rises to power, spreading evil across the land. Upon hearing that the Enchantress has unsealed the Tower of Fate, Shovel Knight takes up his shovel again and ventures towards it, hoping to find and rescue Shield Knight. In order to do so, Shovel Knight must fight the eight members of "The Order of No Quarter," who have been dispatched by the Enchantress to impede him.
Shovel Knight (USA).desc:
《鏟子騎士》是一款 2014 年動作平台視頻遊戲，由獨立開發商 Yacht Club Games 為 Nintendo 3DS、Wii U 和個人電腦平台開發和發行。該遊戲於 2014 年 6 月 26 日在全球發布。 《鏟子騎士》由前 WayForward Technologies 成員 Sean Velasco 執導，音樂由 Jake Kaufman 和 Manami Matsumae 創作。
遊戲開始前，冒險家鏟子騎士和盾騎士並肩作戰，穿越世界尋找寶藏。然而，當兩人探索命運之塔時，兩人卻陷入了被詛咒的護身符的黑暗魔力之下。當鏟子騎士甦醒時，塔已被封印，盾騎士也不見踪影。鏟子騎士因思念所愛之人而放棄冒險，與世隔絕。然而，在他缺席期間，女巫掌權，在這片土地上散播邪惡。聽說魔女解開了命運之塔的封印，鏟子騎士再次拿起鏟子，冒險前往，希望能找到並營救盾騎士。為此，鏟子騎士必須與女巫派來阻礙他的八名“無敵騎士團”成員戰鬥。

Sonic - Lost World (Europe).name: 索尼克 - 失落的世界
Sonic - Lost World (Europe).original_desc: Dr. Eggman has harnessed the power of six menacing creatures known as the Deadly Six, but when the Deadly Six rise up against their master, Sonic has to unite with his arch nemesis in order to take on the new enemies head-to-head. Using his dynamic new parkour moves and improved Colour Powers, Sonic must run, jump and race through a variety of ever changing terrains in order to defeat the Deadly Six.
Sonic - Lost World (Europe).desc: 艾格曼博士利用了被稱為“致命六人”的六種威脅生物的力量，但當“致命六人”奮起反抗他們的主人時，索尼克必須與他的宿敵聯合起來，才能與新敵人正面交鋒。索尼克必須利用他充滿活力的新跑酷動作和改進的色彩力量，在各種不斷變化的地形中奔跑、跳躍和競賽，才能擊敗致命六人組。

Sonic Generations (Europe).name: 索尼克世代
Sonic Generations (Europe).original_desc: Set across three defining eras from 20 years of Sonic the Hedgehog video game history, the instantly recognisable environments of Sonic Generations have been re-built in stunning HD and are now playable in both classic side scrolling 2D from 1991, as well as modern 3D style found in Sonic's most recent adventures. Each incarnation of Sonic in Sonic Generations comes complete with his trademark special move, Spin Dash and Spin Attack for Classic Sonic, and Homing Attack and Sonic Boost for Modern Sonic. An innovative new interactive menu system allows for complete immersion in Sonic's universe with favourite characters and hidden treasures gradually being revealed throughout the game.
Sonic Generations (Europe).desc: 《刺猬索尼克》視頻遊戲歷史跨越了 20 年的三個決定性時代，《索尼克世代》中可立即識別的環境已以令人驚嘆的高清版本重新構建，現在可以以 1991 年的經典橫向捲軸 2D 模式以及索尼克最新冒險中的現代 3D 風格進行遊戲。索尼克在《索尼克世代》中的每一個化身都配有他標誌性的特殊動作，經典索尼克的旋轉衝刺和旋轉攻擊，現代索尼克的歸巢攻擊和音速增強。創新的交互式菜單系統讓您完全沉浸在索尼克的宇宙中，最喜歡的角色和隱藏的寶藏在整個遊戲中逐漸顯現出來。

Star Fox 64 3D (Europe).name: 星際火狐64 3D
Star Fox 64 3D (Europe).original_desc:
The Star Fox team triumphantly returns to one of its greatest missions with this remake of Star Fox 64 in full 3D, featuring a complete graphical update.
The entire Star Fox universe spreads out realistically into the depths of the Nintendo 3DS screen while the 3D visuals give the player a clearer grasp of distance and position. This makes the game more approachable and intuitive, thereby allowing players to focus on the action.
Star Fox 64 3D (Europe).desc:
《星際火狐》團隊以全 3D 方式重製《星際火狐 64》，並進行了完整的圖形更新，成功回歸其最偉大的任務之一。
整個《星際火狐》宇宙真實地展開到任天堂 3DS 屏幕的深處，而 3D 視覺效果讓玩家更清楚地掌握距離和位置。這使得遊戲更加平易近人、直觀，從而讓玩家能夠專注於動作。

Story of Seasons - Trio of Towns (USA).key: Story of Seasons - Trio of Towns (USA)
Story of Seasons - Trio of Towns (USA).original_name: Story of Seasons - Trio of Towns (USA)
Story of Seasons - Trio of Towns (USA).name: 季節的故事 - 城鎮三重奏
Story of Seasons - Trio of Towns (USA).original_desc:
What will you do today? Take charge of an expansive farm near three unique and exciting towns and choose what kind of life to lead.
The original and best-selling farming/life sim returns for its 20th anniversary with a brand new adventure!
Take on the role of a young city slicker who has always wished for a life on the farm. Your dream leads you to a huge plot of open land just ready to be filled with crops, livestock, decorations, and more.
Your new farm is at the crossroads of three different towns. Westown, with its cows and corrals, has everything the classic frontier settler needs. Right next door is Lulukoko Town, a warm, friendly paradise to rival any tropical island. Rounding out the neighborhood is Tsuyukusa, a traditional Far Eastern village. Become friends with the residents and help them improve their towns, then connect to other farmers like you, locally or via internet, to chat and trade useful items.
Grow crops, raise adorable pets, become a renowned chef or fashionista, and even discover romance with the locals. It's all up to you in STORY OF SEASONS: Trio of Towns.
Story of Seasons - Trio of Towns (USA).desc:
今天你會做什麼？負責管理三個獨特而令人興奮的城鎮附近的廣闊農場，並選擇過什麼樣的生活。
原創最暢銷的農業/生活模擬遊戲帶著全新的冒險回歸 20 週年！
扮演一位年輕的城市人，一直渴望在農場生活。你的夢想會帶你來到一大片開闊的土地，準備種植農作物、牲畜、裝飾品等等。
您的新農場位於三個不同城鎮的十字路口。西鎮擁有奶牛和畜欄，擁有經典邊境定居者所需的一切。隔壁就是盧盧科科鎮 (Lulukoko Town)，這是一個可與任何熱帶島嶼媲美的溫暖、友好的天堂。鄰近地區還有傳統的遠東村莊 Tsuyukusa。與居民成為朋友，幫助他們改善城鎮，然後在本地或通過互聯網與像您一樣的其他農民聯繫，聊天和交易有用的物品。
種植農作物、飼養可愛的寵物、成為著名廚師或時尚達人，甚至與當地人發現浪漫。在《季節故事：城鎮三重奏》中，一切都由您決定。

Story of Seasons (USA).name: 季節的故事
Story of Seasons (USA).original_desc:
Story of Seasons is a farming simulation video game developed by Marvelous Entertainment for the Nintendo 3DS. It was released in Japan on February 27, 2014, and in North America on March 31, 2015. The game is not under the Harvest Moon title in North America due to Natsume's ownership of the name. However, less than a month later, Natsume themselves announced their own original title, not produced by Marvelous, Harvest Moon: The Lost Valley released only in North America and Europe, also released in 2014 for the Nintendo 3DS.
The game follows along the same lines as the rest of the series, in which the player takes on the role of a farmer. The player can choose to play a boy or girl farmer. The player can choose between two difficulties at the beginning of the game, but this cannot be changed once the choice is made. There are a variety of things to do in this game, such as producing crops and raising livestock. Story of Seasons introduces new characters, including a tiny goddess and a tiny witch.
Story of Seasons (USA).desc:
Story of Seasons 是 Marvelous Entertainment 為任天堂 3DS 開發的一款農業模擬視頻遊戲。該遊戲於2014年2月27日在日本發行，並於2015年3月31日在北美髮行。由於夏目擁有該名稱，該遊戲在北美並未以Harvest Moon為標題。然而，不到一個月後，夏目自己宣布了自己的原創作品，不是由 Marvelous 製作的，《牧場物語：失落的山谷》僅在北美和歐洲發行，同樣於 2014 年在任天堂 3DS 上發行。
遊戲遵循與該系列其他遊戲相同的路線，其中玩家扮演農民的角色。玩家可以選擇扮演男孩或女孩農民。玩家在遊戲開始時可以在兩種難度之間進行選擇，但一旦做出選擇就無法更改。這個遊戲中有各種各樣的事情可以做，比如種植農作物和飼養牲畜。《季節的故事》引入了新角色，包括小女神和小女巫。

Super Mario 3D Land (USA).name: 超級瑪利歐3D樂園
Super Mario 3D Land (USA).original_desc: Super Mario 3D Land is a platform game that has been described by game designer Shigeru Miyamoto as a "3D Mario that plays as a 2D Mario game." As such, Super Mario 3D Land combines the elements of traditional side-scrolling Mario titles, such as linear-based levels, with those of the modern open world Mario titles, such as moving Mario in three dimensions and performing a variety of actions. Similar to the classic side-scrolling Mario games, the objective of each level is to reach and grab the "Goal Pole" located at the end of the course before the time limit expires. Super Mario 3D Land utilizes a similar health system to those games, in which Mario shrinks upon taking damage from enemies or hazards, and damage while as "Small Mario" results in losing a life.
Super Mario 3D Land (USA).desc: 《超級馬里奧 3D 大陸》是一款平台遊戲，遊戲設計師宮本茂將其描述為“像 2D 馬里奧遊戲一樣玩的 3D 馬里奧”。因此，《Super Mario 3D Land》結合了傳統橫向捲軸 Mario 遊戲的元素（例如基於線性的關卡）與現代開放世界 Mario 遊戲的元素（例如在三個維度中移動 Mario 並執行各種動作）。與經典的橫向捲軸馬里奧遊戲類似，每個級別的目標都是在時間限製到期之前到達並抓住位於路線末端的“球門桿”。《超級馬里奧 3D 世界》採用了與這些遊戲類似的健康系統，其中馬里奧在受到敵人或危險的傷害時會縮小，而“小馬里奧”受到傷害會導致失去生命。

Taiko no Tatsujin - Don to Katsu no Jiku.key: Taiko no Tatsujin - Don to Katsu no Jikuu Daibouken (Japan) (Translated En)
Taiko no Tatsujin - Don to Katsu no Jiku.original_name: Taiko no Tatsujin - Don to Katsu no Jikuu Daibouken (Japan) (Translated En)
Taiko no Tatsujin - Don to Katsu no Jiku.name: 太鼓達人 - 用碗和炸豬排進行的時空大冒險

Tekken 3D - Prime Edition (Europe).name: 鐵拳 3D - Prime 版
Tekken 3D - Prime Edition (Europe).original_desc:
Play the game, watch the movie!
Tekken 3D Prime Edition contains the complete entertainment world of TEKKEN onto a single Nintendo 3DS card!
Play the game, watch the movie! Tekken 3D Prime Edition contains the complete entertainment world of TEKKEN onto a single Nintendo 3DS card! Battle with more than 40 fighters from the TEKKEN universe and with Young Heihachi for the first time ever! In addition, watch TEKKEN: Blood Vengeance, a full 3D theatrical experience produced by Digital Frontier in conjunction with the Tekken Project development team. With the satisfying combination of a movie and fully featured portable Tekken gaming experience, players can take TEKKEN wherever they go.
Tekken Experience ? Contains the complete TEKKEN: Blood Vengeance 3D movie and the intense fighting action of the TEKKEN series in one package
Card Collector ? Amass your collection of original Tekken Cards in-game or obtain using StreetPass to find them all
Time to Fight ? Play in multiple single player modes or take the battle to the streets through Local Play and Internet Play
Bloody Vengeance ? Watch the full length theatrical feature TEKKEN: Blood Vengeance in full 3D through the Nintendo 3DS system
Tekken 3D - Prime Edition (Europe).desc:
玩遊戲，看電影！
鐵拳 3D Prime 版將《鐵拳》的完整娛樂世界包含在一張任天堂 3DS 卡上！
玩遊戲，看電影！鐵拳 3D Prime 版將《鐵拳》的完整娛樂世界包含在一張任天堂 3DS 卡上！有史以來第一次與 TEKKEN 宇宙中的 40 多名戰士以及幼年平八一起戰鬥！此外，還可以觀看《鐵拳：血色復仇》，這是由 Digital Frontier 與鐵拳項目開發團隊合作製作的全 3D 影院體驗。電影與功能齊全的便攜式《鐵拳》遊戲體驗完美結合，玩家可以帶著《鐵拳》走到任何地方。
鐵拳體驗？包含完整的 TEKKEN: Blood Vengeance 3D 電影和 TEKKEN 系列的激烈戰鬥動作於一包中
卡牌收藏家？在遊戲中收集原創《鐵拳》卡牌，或使用 StreetPass 找到所有卡牌
戰鬥時間到了？以多種單人遊戲模式進行遊戲，或通過本地遊戲和互聯網游戲將戰鬥帶到街頭
血腥復仇？通過 Nintendo 3DS 系統觀看全長 3D 劇場版《鐵拳：血色復仇》

Terraria (USA) (Rev 1) Decrypted.name: 泰拉瑞亞解密
Terraria (USA) (Rev 1) Decrypted.original_desc:
Terraria is a two dimensional platform game of exploration and crafting. Players can use mines and picks to collect various items from the environment including wood, ore and even spider webs. Resources acquired from the environment can be placed or crafted into all manner of items.
The simple crafting system automatically lists any item that you have the materials to craft. First priority is to set up a base before night fall hits in order to protect yourself from roving zombies and eyeball monsters. You can craft many items for your home, including doors, walls, tables, chairs and beds.
During the daytime slimes roam the land and must be avoided or dispatched with a weapon such as a sword or axe. As you gather materials you will be able to construct more powerful weapons from different ores as well as armor to protect yourself.
30 monsters are present in the game including slimes, floating eyeballs, giant earth worms and zombies.
Building a nice home will attract NPC (non-player characters) to your house to set up residence. These can include a merchant to trade with and nurses who can heal your wounds.
Terraria supports single player,  multi-player servers and player vs player combat.
Terraria (USA) (Rev 1) Decrypted.desc:
Terraria 是一款探索和製作的二維平台遊戲。玩家可以使用地雷和鎬從環境中收集各種物品，包括木材、礦石甚至蜘蛛網。從環境中獲取的資源可以放置或製作成各種物品。
簡單的製作系統會自動列出您擁有製作材料的所有物品。當務之急是在夜幕降臨之前建立一個基地，以保護自己免受遊蕩的殭屍和眼球怪物的侵害。您可以為您的家製作許多物品，包括門、牆壁、桌子、椅子和床。
白天，史萊姆會在陸地上游盪，必須使用劍或斧頭等武器來避開或消滅它們。當你收集材料時，你將能夠用不同的礦石建造更強大的武器以及保護自己的盔甲。
遊戲中有30種怪物，包括史萊姆、浮眼珠、巨型蚯蚓和殭屍。
建造一個漂亮的家會吸引NPC（非玩家角色）到你的房子來安家落戶。其中包括可以與之進行交易的商人和可以治愈你傷口的護士。
泰拉瑞亞支持單人遊戲、多人服務器以及玩家對玩家的戰鬥。

Tomodachi Life (Europe).name: 朋友生活
Tomodachi Life (Europe).original_desc: Tomodachi Life is a communication game for the 3DS in which players can convert their Miis into Tomodachis (or create new ones) and put them in a wide range of scenarios ranging from charming to utterly ridiculous. A key feature of the game is its text-to-speech tech which outputs user generated text as computerized speech in seven languages (EFIGS, Japanese and Korean).
Tomodachi Life (Europe).desc: Tomodachi Life 是一款 3DS 通訊遊戲，玩家可以將他們的 Miis 轉換為 Tomodachi（或創建新的），並將它們置於從迷人到完全荒謬的各種場景中。該遊戲的一個關鍵功能是其文本轉語音技術，該技術可將用戶生成的文本輸出為七種語言（EFIGS、日語和韓語）的計算機化語音。

Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal - World Duel Carnival.name: 是的-哦！澤爾 - 世界決鬥嘉年華
Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal - World Duel Carnival.original_desc:
Play as yourself or one of eleven playable characters from the series, like Yuma, Astral, Tori, Shark and more, each with their own storyline and earn an invite to the World Duel Carnival where you can battle with more than 40 Duelists from the TV show! Players can enjoy a Story Mode and a Free Duel Mode where they can play with more than 5,700 cards.
-The very first Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL video game and the first Yu-Gi-Oh! video game available for the Nintendo 3DS handheld system.
-Twelve playable characters, each with a unique storyline that can be experienced through Story Mode.
-Battle with more than 40 colorful Duelists.
-Customize your Deck with more than 5,700 cards from the official Yu-Gi-Oh! TRADING CARD GAME.
-In-game animated cinematics, and exciting Monster summon effects bring Duels to life.
-Explore all the options in Free Duel Mode and customize card sleeves, game mats, and even Deck Lists to Duel for hours.
Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal - World Duel Carnival.desc:
扮演您自己或該系列中的 11 個可玩角色之一，如 Yuma、Astral、Tori、Shark 等，每個角色都有自己的故事情節，並獲得參加世界決鬥嘉年華的邀請，在那裡您可以與電視節目中的 40 多名決鬥者戰鬥！玩家可以享受故事模式和自由決鬥模式，在其中可以玩超過 5,700 張卡牌。
-第一個遊戲王！ZEXAL 視頻遊戲和第一款遊戲王！適用於任天堂 3DS 手持系統的視頻遊戲。
- 十二個可玩角色，每個角色都有獨特的故事情節，可以通過故事模式體驗。
- 與 40 多名色彩繽紛的決鬥者戰鬥。
- 使用來自官方遊戲王的 5,700 多張卡牌定制您的牌組！集換式卡牌遊戲。
- 遊戲中的動畫電影和令人興奮的怪物召喚效果使決鬥變得栩栩如生。
- 探索免費決鬥模式中的所有選項，並定制卡套、遊戲墊，甚至數小時的決鬥牌組列表。

Zero Escape - Virtue's Last Reward (Euro.name: 零逃脫——美德的最後獎賞
Zero Escape - Virtue's Last Reward (Euro.original_desc:
You thought you'd defeated the Nonary Game, but now it's back, and more deadly than ever. It'll take cunning, skill, and more than a little luck to escape alive, but do you really have a choice?
IDO agents working in California report that preliminary findings indicate the exceedingly dangerous Japanese adventure game known as "Zennin Shiboudesu" has somehow crossed the Pacific. Attempts were made to contain it, but some carriers seem to have escaped the quarantine and are now at large.
Zero Escape - Virtue's Last Reward (Euro.desc:
你以為你已經打敗了九元遊戲，但現在它又回來了，而且比以往任何時候都更加致命。要想活著逃脫，需要狡猾、技巧和一點點運氣，但你真的有選擇嗎？
在加州工作的 IDO 特工報告說，初步調查結果表明，極其危險的日本冒險遊戲“Zennin Shiboudesu”已經以某種方式穿越了太平洋。人們曾試圖遏制它，但一些攜帶者似乎已經逃脫了隔離，目前在逃。

Ever Oasis (Europe).name: 永遠的綠洲
Ever Oasis (Europe).original_desc:
The desert's last safe haven is a lone oasis you call home. So draw a line in the sand and fight to protect it! As you explore the desert and solve puzzling dungeons, you'll gather resources to build up your oasis with the water spirit Esna. Allies will join your cause, so equip them with weapons, and use their skills to slay towering bosses.

The Ever Oasisâ„¢ game is a new action-adventure RPG grown from the ground up by Koichi Ishii, creator of the Mana series and producer at GREZZO, the studio that rebuilt multiple The Legend of Zeldaâ„¢ games for the Nintendo 3DSâ„¢ family of systems. Their team has crafted puzzles and traps too perilous for one hero to solve. So recruit a party of allies and level up their stats to learn new battle skills. Then return to your oasis and restore it: choose which shops to build, stock their inventories, collect a share of the profits, and keep villagers happy by fulfilling requests. Before long your oasis will blossom into a beacon of hope for all walks of life in the desert. Don't let them down.
Ever Oasis (Europe).desc:
沙漠最後的避風港是你稱之為家的孤獨綠洲。所以，在沙子上畫一條線，並努力保護它！當你探索沙漠並解決令人費解的地牢時，你將收集資源，與水精靈埃斯納一起建立你的綠洲。盟友將加入你的事業，所以為他們配備武器，並利用他們的技能殺死高大的頭目。

《Ever Oasis™》遊戲是一款新的動作冒險角色扮演遊戲，由《聖劍傳說》系列的創作者兼 GREZZO 製作人石井浩一 (Koichi Ishii) 全新開發。 GREZZO 工作室為 Nintendo 3DS™ 系列系統重建了多款《塞爾達傳說》遊戲。他們的團隊精心設計了一個英雄無法解決的謎題和陷阱。因此，招募一隊盟友併升級他們的統計數據以學習新的戰鬥技能。然後返回您的遊戲綠洲並恢復它：選擇建造哪些商店，儲存庫存，收集利潤，並通過滿足村民的要求來讓他們高興，不久之後，你的綠洲就會成為沙漠中各行各業的希望燈塔，不要讓他們失望。

50 Classic Games 3D (USA).name: 50 款經典 3D 遊戲
50 Classic Games 3D (USA).original_desc:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)It?s all right here, in 50 Classic Games for Nintendo 3DS! With new 
eye-popping graphics and interactive features, you?ll get lost for hours 
in the wildly entertaining games that range from backgammon to 
brainteasers! Try your hand at Texas Hold?Em, Blackjack, and Roulette. 
Rediscover classic board and dice games like Farkle, Chess, and 
Mahjongg. Go fishing, play air hockey, take out enemy battleships, and 
throw darts! Solve tricky brainteasers, picture puzzles, and more!


Features


? Try your hand at Texas Hold?Em and Roulette? Play 
games like Farkle, Chess, and Mahjongg? Go fishing, play air hockey, 
and throw darts!? Solve tricky brainteasers, picture puzzles, and 
more!
50 Classic Games 3D (USA).desc:
Nintendo.com 描述（來自 Ad Blurbs）Nintendo 3DS 的 50 款經典遊戲就在這裡！與新
令人瞠目結舌的圖形和交互功能，你會迷失幾個小時
在從雙陸棋到
腦筋急轉彎！試試德州撲克、二十一點和輪盤賭。
重新發現經典的棋盤和骰子遊戲，例如 Farkle、國際象棋和
麻將。釣魚、打空氣曲棍球、幹掉敵方戰艦，
扔飛鏢！解決棘手的腦筋急轉彎、圖片謎題等等！


特徵


？試試德州撲克、輪盤賭嗎？玩
像 Farkle、國際象棋和麻將這樣的遊戲？去釣魚、打空氣曲棍球、
並扔飛鏢！ ？解決棘手的腦筋急轉彎、圖片謎題，以及
更多！

Fire Emblem Fates - Conquest (USA) Decry.name: 火焰之纹章if
Fire Emblem Fates - Conquest (USA) Decry.original_desc: Two kingdoms are on the brink of war. Whose side will you choose? Torn between two families, you're an heir of Hoshido, raised by Nohrian royals. If you walk the path of Conquest, you must fight to change your misguided kingdom from within. Command warriors with expert precision and forge deep relationships to master this turn-based strategy game.
Fire Emblem Fates - Conquest (USA) Decry.desc: 兩個王國正處於戰爭邊緣。你會選擇哪一邊呢？你是星戶的繼承人，由諾里王室成員撫養長大，夾在兩個家庭之間。如果你走征服之路，你就必須努力從內部改變你被誤導的王國。以專業的精確度指揮戰士並建立深厚的關係，以掌握這款回合製策略遊戲。

Face Racers - Photo Finish (USA).name: 臉部賽車手 - 照片完成
Face Racers - Photo Finish (USA).original_desc:
Start your turbo-charged engines and blast into the outrageous arcade racing game, Face Racers: Photo Finish, with photo customizable 3D racers that put YOU in the game! Available on the Nintendo 3DS, Face Racers delivers unique, in-your-face gameplay, with dangerous obstacles that come to life in 3D right before your eyes! Take photos with your 3DS camera and place them on the face of your custom 3D racer, billboards and power-ups. Take on friends in multiplayer mode for a true photo finish in Face Racers!

Features

? Use your photo to customize your racer, billboards, and power-ups!? Challenge up to 3 friends in local and online multiplayer.? Take control of the wheel with 3DS tilt-steering.
Face Racers - Photo Finish (USA).desc:
啟動你的渦輪增壓引擎，衝進令人驚嘆的街機賽車遊戲《Face Racers: Photo Finish》，照片可定制的 3D 賽車讓你身臨其境！Face Racers 可在 Nintendo 3DS 上使用，提供獨特的、面對面的遊戲玩法，危險的障礙物以 3D 形式呈現在您眼前！使用 3DS 相機拍攝照片並將其放置在自定義 3D 賽車、廣告牌和道具的表面上。在多人遊戲模式中與好友一較高下，在 Face Racers 中獲得真實的照片！

特徵

？使用您的照片來定制您的賽車手、廣告牌和道具！ ？在本地和在線多人遊戲中挑戰最多 3 位朋友。通過 3DS 傾斜轉向來控制方向盤。

Crush3d.name: 粉碎3D
Crush3d.original_desc: Danny is troubled with insomnia. Desperate for sleep and unable to get it, he finds himself a test subject in the mad Dr. Reubens' crowning achievement, C.R.U.S.H. (or Cognitive Regression Utilizing pSychiatric Heuristics, if you prefer). C.R.U.S.H. puts the subject under hypnosis and allows them to explore their psyche and confront their own deep, dark secrets.
Crush3d.desc: 丹尼飽受失眠之苦。由於極度渴望睡眠卻無法入睡，他發現自己成為了瘋狂魯本斯博士的最高成就 C.R.U.S.H. 的測試對象。（或者如果您願意的話，利用精神病學啟發法進行認知回歸）。壓碎。將受試者置於催眠狀態，讓他們探索自己的心靈，面對自己內心深處、黑暗的秘密。

Mario & Luigi - Superstar Saga + Bowser'.key: Mario & Luigi - Superstar Saga + Bowser's Minions (USA)
Mario & Luigi - Superstar Saga + Bowser'.original_name: Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga + Bowser's Minions
Mario & Luigi - Superstar Saga + Bowser'.name: 馬里奧與路易吉：超級巨星傳奇 + 庫巴的小黃人
Mario & Luigi - Superstar Saga + Bowser'.original_desc:
Save Princess Peach's voice, the Beanbean Kingdom and ... Bowser?!



The game that launched the Mario & Luigi series returns looking better than ever before. In this renewed classic, Mario and Luigi journey to the Beanbean Kingdom with Bowser to restore Princess Peach?s voice. Control Mario and Luigi simultaneously, making use of their unique Bros. Moves to solve puzzles and emerge victorious in action-packed battles. Pay heed to the enemy?s patterns and time your reactions right to land satisfying counterblows. Included in this remake is the Minion Quest: The Search for Bowser mode, which tells the story of the game from the perspective of Bowser?s minions. Recruit characters to grow your own Minion army as you fight to locate your missing leader!

Features:

Mario and Luigi have access to different techniques, known as Bros. Moves, necessary for solving puzzles on their adventure. Switch between the two characters at will to pave your way and progress through new areas.
Time your button presses to skillfully dodge enemy blows, land devastating counters, and inflict increased damage in battle. Utilize Bros. Attacks that dish out massive damage!
In the brand new mode titled Minion Quest: The Search for Bowser, become the unlikely hero, Captain Goomba. Journey together with ShyGuy, Boo and other familiar Baddies.
The Minion Quest storyline takes place during Mario & Luigi?s classic adventure. Find out what really transpired behind-the-scenes!
Compatible with amiibo? figures* from the Super Mario series, including Mario and Luigi amiibo figures. Also coming soon are brand new Goomba and Koopa Troopa amiibo. The Goomba, Koopa Troopa and Boo amiibo figures will each have read/write compatibility.
Mario & Luigi - Superstar Saga + Bowser'.desc:
拯救桃子公主的聲音、豆豆王國和……庫巴？ ！



推出《馬里奧與路易吉》系列的遊戲回歸，看起來比以往任何時候都更好。在這部全新經典中，馬里奧和路易吉與庫巴一起前往豆豆王國，恢復桃子公主的聲音。同時控制馬里奧和路易吉，利用他們獨特的兄弟動作來解決謎題並在充滿動作的戰鬥中取得勝利。注意敵人的模式並把握正確的反應時機，以獲得令人滿意的反擊。此重製版中包含“小黃人任務：尋找庫巴”模式，該模式從庫巴的小黃人的角度講述遊戲的故事。招募角色來發展你自己的小黃人軍隊，並努力尋找失踪的領袖！

特點：

馬里奧和路易吉可以使用不同的技術，稱為兄弟動作，這是解決冒險中的謎題所必需的。隨意在兩個角色之間切換，為你鋪平道路並在新領域取得進展。
把握好按下按鈕的時機，巧妙地躲避敵人的攻擊，投下毀滅性的反擊物，並在戰鬥中造成更大的傷害。利用兄弟攻擊造成巨大傷害！
在名為“小黃人任務：尋找庫巴”的全新模式中，成為看似不太可能的英雄，古巴隊長。與 ShyGuy、Boo 和其他熟悉的壞蛋一起踏上旅程。
小黃人任務故事情節發生在馬里奧和路易吉的經典冒險中。找出幕後真正發生的事情！
兼容amiibo嗎？超級馬里奧系列人物*，包括馬里奧和路易吉 amiibo 人物。即將推出的還有全新的 Goomba 和 Koopa Troopa amiibo。Goomba、Koopa Troopa 和 Boo amiibo 人偶都具有讀/寫兼容性。

F1 2011 (USA).name: F1 2011
F1 2011 (USA).original_desc:
F1 2011 is the handheld adaptation of the main F1 2011 game. It offers the full 2011 racing season with all stages and it incorporates the multi-season career mode from the main game. In addition there are Grand Prix weekends and three-lap sprints. Grand Prix events are split up in practice runs, qualifying sessions and the main races themselves. There are driving aids (including determining the race distance), weather effects, fuel and tires options, and it includes the KERS and DRS systems from the main version.

Unique to the handheld versions is a number of mini-game challenges such as checkpoints races, overtaking, autocross-style slaloms or racing in specific situations such as the last two laps of a race in the rain with the wrong tires equipped. They are organized in tiers with a bonus one at the end. The performance in these challenges is ranked with a letter. The game can be played online and for the 3DS StreetPass is used to unlock rival ghosts. Both versions support multiplayer, local as well as online, in head-to-head time trails or in a full Grand Prix. On the Vita the front touch screen is used to change the camera and the rear touch pad can be used as an optional substitute for actions such as braking and throttling.

Differences from the console version include downgraded graphics, a simplified damage model and certain animated sequences that have been cut.
F1 2011 (USA).desc:
F1 2011 是主要 F1 2011 遊戲的掌機改編版。它提供了完整的 2011 年賽車賽季的所有階段，並融合了主遊戲中的多賽季生涯模式。此外還有大獎賽週末和三圈衝刺賽。大獎賽分為練習賽、排位賽和正賽。有駕駛輔助（包括確定比賽距離）、天氣影響、燃油和輪胎選項，並且包括主版本中的 KERS 和 DRS 系統。

手持版本的獨特之處在於許多迷你游戲挑戰，例如檢查站比賽、超車、汽車越野賽式迴轉或在特定情況下比賽，例如雨中比賽的最後兩圈，輪胎配備錯誤。它們按層組織，最後有獎勵層。這些挑戰中的表現用字母進行排名。該遊戲可以在線玩，3DS StreetPass 可以用來解鎖對手的幽靈。兩個版本都支持多人遊戲，本地和在線，在面對面的時間跟踪或完整的大獎賽中。在 Vita 上，前觸摸屏用於更改攝像頭，後觸摸板可用作制動和油門等操作的可選替代品。

與主機版本的差異包括降級的圖形、簡化的損壞模型和某些已被刪除的動畫序列。

Bravely Default (Europe).name: 勇敢默認
Bravely Default (Europe).original_desc: This new yet traditional offering from Square Enix captures the charm and elegant and simplicity of yesteryear's canonical RPGs. Become a Warrior of Light and journey to the land of Luxemdarc in this classic tale of personal growth and adventure.
Bravely Default (Europe).desc: Square Enix 推出的這款全新而傳統的產品捕捉了昔日經典角色扮演遊戲的魅力、優雅和簡潔。在這個關於個人成長和冒險的經典故事中，成為一名光之戰士並前往盧森達爾克之地。

Dead or Alive - Dimensions (Europe).name: 死或生 - 尺寸
Dead or Alive - Dimensions (Europe).original_desc: DEAD OR ALIVE Dimensions takes the vivacious characters and locales that have made the DOA franchise a hit with gamers everywhere and presents them in eye-popping 3D. All of the punches, kicks, counters and holds that have defined the series as a top-tier fighter are present for the first time on a portable gaming system - the Nintendo 3DS. DEAD OR ALIVE Dimensions features some of the best content from the series spanning all of the titles from the original DOA up to DOA 4.
Dead or Alive - Dimensions (Europe).desc: 《DEAD OR ALIVE Dimensions》採用了 DOA 系列深受世界各地玩家歡迎的活潑角色和場景，並以令人瞠目結舌的 3D 方式呈現。將該系列定義為頂級格鬥遊戲的所有拳擊、踢腿、反擊和握持動作均首次出現在便攜式遊戲系統 - 任天堂 3DS 上。DEAD OR ALIVE Dimensions 收錄了該系列的一些最佳內容，涵蓋從最初的《DOA》到《DOA 4》的所有遊戲。

Etrian Odyssey Untold The Millennium Gir.key: Etrian Odyssey Untold The Millennium Girl (USA)
Etrian Odyssey Untold The Millennium Gir.original_name: Etrian Odyssey Untold: The Millennium Girl
Etrian Odyssey Untold The Millennium Gir.name: 埃特里安奧德賽不為人知：千年女孩
Etrian Odyssey Untold The Millennium Gir.original_desc:
Etrian Odyssey Untold is a game in two parts: the first part is a story-driven first person adventure into the world of Etria. Appropriate for players new to the series and veterans alike, the Story mode gives players five pre-made characters, each with their own personalities and dialogue to explore a side of Etria not seen in the first game. Adventurers must brave new dungeon layouts, floors, and enemies to find out the truth of the Yggdrasil Tree and the mysterious girl, Frederica.

For series veterans, Classic mode offers the traditional Etrian Odyssey gameplay, updated to the latest conveniences found in Etrian Odyssey IV, including full 3-D graphics. The game also includes animated opening and story cutscenes by MADHOUSE Inc. and voiceovers for the story and battle scenes, plus the option for orchestrated background music.
Etrian Odyssey Untold The Millennium Gir.desc:
Etrian Odyssey Untold 是一款由兩部分組成的遊戲：第一部分是故事驅動的第一人稱冒險，進入 Etria 世界。故事模式適合該系列的新玩家和老玩家，為玩家提供五個預製角色，每個角色都有自己的個性和對話，以探索第一款遊戲中未見的 Etria 的一面。冒險者必須勇敢面對新的地牢佈局、樓層和敵人，找出世界之樹和神秘女孩弗雷德麗卡的真相。

對於系列老手來說，經典模式提供了傳統的 Etrian Odyssey 遊戲玩法，並更新為 Etrian Odyssey IV 中的最新便利設施，包括全 3D 圖形。遊戲還包括由 MADHOUSE Inc. 製作的動畫開場和故事過場動畫以及故事和戰斗場景的畫外音，以及精心編排的背景音樂選項。

Mario Kart 7 (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl.name: 瑪利歐賽車7
Mario Kart 7 (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl.original_desc: The newest installment of the fan-favorite Mario Kart franchise brings Mushroom Kingdom racing fun into glorious 3D. For the first time, drivers explore new competitive kart possibilities, such as soaring through the skies or plunging to the depths of the sea. New courses, strategic new abilities and customizable karts bring the racing excitement to new heights.
Mario Kart 7 (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl.desc: 深受粉絲喜愛的《馬里奧賽車》系列的最新作品將蘑菇王國的賽車樂趣帶入光彩奪目的 3D 之中。車手們第一次探索新的競技卡丁車可能性，例如翱翔於天空或潛入大海深處。新賽道、戰略性新能力和可定制的卡丁車將賽車的興奮感提升到了新的高度。

Etrian Odyssey IV - Legends of the Titan.key: Etrian Odyssey IV - Legends of the Titan (Europe)
Etrian Odyssey IV - Legends of the Titan.original_name: Etrian Odyssey 4 - Legends Of The Titan
Etrian Odyssey IV - Legends of the Titan.name: Etrian Odyssey 4 - 泰坦傳奇
Etrian Odyssey IV - Legends of the Titan.original_desc: For centuries, the tree Yggdrasil has been a constant presence in the lives of the people of Tharsis. It looms on the horizon, visible from everywhere in the city. But its roots are in a far-off land where no one has ventured until the Outland Count of Tharsis sponsors an Explorers Guild to reach Yggdrasil and discover its secrets. You are the latest explorer arriving in Tharsis to seek your fame and fortune. Board your skyship and set out into the clouds in search of treasure, glory, and the answer to Tharsis' oldest mystery.
Etrian Odyssey IV - Legends of the Titan.desc: 幾個世紀以來，世界之樹一直存在於塔爾西斯人民的生活中。它隱約出現在地平線上，從城市的任何地方都可以看到。但它的根源在於一片遙遠的土地，直到塔西斯外域伯爵贊助探險家公會到達世界樹並發現它的秘密之前，沒有人冒險去過那裡。您是最新抵達塔爾西斯尋求名譽和財富的探險家。登上你的飛船，出發進入雲層，尋找寶藏、榮耀，以及塔爾西斯最古老的謎團的答案。

Donkey Kong Country Returns 3D (Europe).name: 大金剛國度歸來 3D
Donkey Kong Country Returns 3D (Europe).original_desc: Over 70 levels of banana-hoarding fun featuring Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong. Run, jump, climb and defeat enemies through diverse environments until you retrieve Donkey Kong's stolen banana hoard. Rebuilt and optimized for portable play on the Nintendo 3DS system.
Donkey Kong Country Returns 3D (Europe).desc: 超過 70 個級別的香蕉囤積樂趣，以大金剛和吹笛人為主角。在不同的環境中奔跑、跳躍、攀爬並擊敗敵人，直到取回大金剛偷來的香蕉寶藏。針對任天堂 3DS 系統上的便攜式遊戲進行了重建和優化。

Legend of Korra - A New Era Begins, The.key: Legend of Korra - A New Era Begins, The (USA)
Legend of Korra - A New Era Begins, The.original_name: The Legend of Korra: A New Era Begins
Legend of Korra - A New Era Begins, The.name: 《科拉傳奇：新時代的開始》
Legend of Korra - A New Era Begins, The.original_desc:
Join Korra and her friends to stop an ancient evil that has emerged from the portal and threatens the balance of both worlds!



Original Avatar storyline penned by the TV show's creators.

Wield the power of all 4 elements?water, earth, fire, and air as only the Avatar can!

Take control of Korra and her friends in strategic battles spanning the world.

Beat overwhelming odds by activating the all-powerful Avatar state.
Legend of Korra - A New Era Begins, The.desc:
與科拉和她的朋友們一起阻止從傳送門中出現並威脅兩個世界平衡的遠古邪惡！



《阿凡達》的原創故事情節由電視節目的創作者撰寫。

像阿凡達一樣運用所有 4 種元素的力量：水、土、火和空氣！

在全球範圍內的戰略戰鬥中控制科拉和她的朋友們。

通過激活全能的阿凡達狀態來克服壓倒性的困難。

Cooking Mama 5 - Bon Appetit! (USA).name: 烹飪媽媽5：祝你胃口好！
Cooking Mama 5 - Bon Appetit! (USA).original_desc: Cooking Mama 5: Bon AppÃ©tit! (ã‚¯ãƒƒã‚­ãƒ³ã‚°ãƒžãƒžï¼• Kukkingu Mama 5) is the sequel to the Nintendo 3DS video game Cooking Mama 4: Kitchen Magic and is the fifth installment to the Cooking Mama series on the Nintendo 3DS. It was released in Japan on November 21, 2013, on September 16, 2014 in North America [2] and on March 6, 2015 in Europe.[3] It contains over 60 recipes and new household activities/games.[4]
Cooking Mama 5 - Bon Appetit! (USA).desc: 烹飪媽媽 5：祝你胃口好！（庫金古媽媽 5）是任天堂 3DS 視頻遊戲《烹飪媽媽 4：廚房魔法》的續作，也是任天堂 3DS 上烹飪媽媽系列的第五部。它於2013年11月21日在日本發行，2014年9月16日在北美髮行[2]，2015年3月6日在歐洲發行。[3]它包含 60 多種食譜和新的家庭活動/遊戲。 [4]

Flap Flap (Europe).name: 皮瓣 皮瓣
Flap Flap (Europe).original_desc:
Summon up all your skill, precision and nerves of steel: Flap Flap won'tgo easy on you!


Bit of a lightweight? Then all the bonuses and special abilities will come in handy?


Unfortunately, there are also enemies and obstacles to make things complicated, too!
Flap Flap (Europe).desc:
調動你所有的技能、精確度和鋼鐵般的意志：Flap Flap 對你來說並不容易！


有點輕？那麼所有的加成和特殊能力都會派上用場嗎？


不幸的是，還有敵人和障礙讓事情變得複雜！

Code Name - S.original_desc: Launch S.T.E.A.M., an elite team of steam-powered special-forces soldiers, to save the world from an alien menace. In this new blend of action and strategy, our commandos use steam power stored in special backpacks to move into position and fire an arsenal of distinct weapons. Pick your team members and load out, then use strategy to decide the best way to approach this steampunk-inspired battlefield.

Dragon Quest VII - Fragments of the Forg.key: Dragon Quest VII - Fragments of the Forgotten Past (USA)
Dragon Quest VII - Fragments of the Forg.original_name: Dragon Quest VII: Fragments of the Forgotten Past
Dragon Quest VII - Fragments of the Forg.name: 勇者鬥惡龍 VII：被遺忘的過去的碎片
Dragon Quest VII - Fragments of the Forg.original_desc: Travel to the past to save the present in this classic Dragon Quest adventure that has been completely remade from the ground up for Nintendo 3DS. The world has been rebuilt, the characters have new 3D models and the story has been completely re-localized. Even customize your party with over 30 classes and rank up in turn-based battles to learn new spells and abilities.
Dragon Quest VII - Fragments of the Forg.desc: 在這款經典勇者鬥惡龍冒險遊戲中穿越到過去拯救現在，該冒險遊戲已針對 Nintendo 3DS 進行了徹底重製。世界已經重建，角色有了新的 3D 模型，故事也已經完全重新本地化。甚至可以用 30 多個類別來定制您的隊伍，並在回合製戰鬥中升級以學習新的咒語和能力。

Fantasy Life.name: 最终幻想VII 重制版
Fantasy Life.original_desc:
FANTASY LIFE* is an original RPG for the Nintendo 3DS from LEVEL-5, featuring music by Nobuo Uematsu and image illustration by Yoshitaka Amano. 
Set in a beautiful and vast open world, players create their own avatars and take up a vocation of their choosing, living out their lives as they see fit. You can set out on an adventure to save the world, or spend your days in leisurely pursuits such as cooking or fishing. Find the meaning of your new life in the limitless possibilities that reside in FANTASY LIFE* on the Nintendo 3DS
Fantasy Life.desc:
《Final Fantasy VIII》（日語：ファイナルファンタジーVIII，英語：Final Fantasy VIII，台港舊譯「太空戰士VIII」）是由史克威爾（現史克威爾艾尼克斯）在1999年於PlayStation平台上發行的電子角色扮演遊戲，是Final Fantasy系列第八部正傳，同年本作也移植至Windows平台。因當時史克威爾授權的港台攻略本與媒體使用港台舊譯「太空戰士8」，所以港台許多老玩家稱此作為太8。是系列首部完全使用現實比例角色造型的作品。遊戲系統取消了一貫消費魔力值發動魔法的方式，改以新創的抽取指令搭配結合系統以培養角色。本作同前作FF7一般採用了具多種現代科技元素的世界觀，但也有著如「魔女」這種具有強大魔力的神秘存在。遊戲講述了一群傭兵學園學生——隸屬於組織「SeeD」——的故事，劇情裡主角群的行動深受世上多數存在的「魔女」所影響，而魔女中強大者甚至能壓縮時間，牽動著角色們的過去與未來。主角史克爾成為SeeD後的首次任務，即被捲入刺殺暗地掌控一國之魔女「Edea」的行動中。
《Final Fantasy VIII》從1997年開始研發，長期負責系列音樂的植松伸夫繼續為本作配樂，但為系列中首次使用歌手演唱之主題曲——王菲的《Eyes on Me》。PlayStation版本的全球累計銷量達800萬套以上。遊戲於2009年作為PSone Classics作品在PlayStation Network上發布。2006年獲得日本雜誌《Fami通》讀者投票的史上最佳遊戲第22名。
2019年8月20日於德國科隆遊戲展Gamescom上，史克威爾艾尼克斯宣布將發售本作的Remastered版，命名為《Final Fantasy VIII Remastered》，定於9月3日發售。

Kirby - Triple Deluxe.name: 卡比 : 三重豪華版
Kirby - Triple Deluxe.original_desc:
Pink? Check. Puffy? Check. Powerful? You have no idea. 

Devour trees, obstacles, and huge chunks of stages with Kirbyâ€™s Hypernova ability and inhale enemies to copy epic new moves like Archer. Itâ€™s a grand new Kirbyâ„¢ adventure PLUS a new multiplayer battle mode, Kirby Fighters! 

When a mysterious being kidnaps King Dedede atop a giant Dreamstalk, only Kirby can save the day! Jump from the foreground to the background in dynamic 3D side-scrolling environments while using new and returning copy abilities to defeat enemies. Duke it out in Kirby Fighters, a fierce 4-player battle mode where you fight using a chosen ability like Sword or Ninja. The last Kirby standing reigns supreme. Whether youâ€™re new to Kirby or an old fan, the Kirby: Triple Deluxe game offers a triple threat - action, adventure, and a battle mode!
Kirby - Triple Deluxe.desc:
粉色的？查看。蓬鬆？查看。強大的？你不知道。

使用卡比的超新星能力吞噬樹木、障礙物和大塊舞台，並吸入敵人以模仿弓箭手等史詩般的新動作。這是一場盛大的全新卡比冒險之旅，還有全新的多人戰鬥模式“卡比戰士”！

當一個神秘生物在巨大的夢莖上綁架了帝帝帝國王時，只有卡比可以拯救世界！在動態 3D 橫向捲軸環境中從前景跳到背景，同時使用新的和回歸的複制能力來擊敗敵人。在卡比戰士中一決高下，這是一種激烈的 4 人戰鬥模式，您可以使用劍或忍者等選定的能力進行戰鬥。最後的卡比佔據了至高無上的地位。無論您是《星之卡比》的新手還是老粉絲，《星之卡比：三重豪華》遊戲都提供三重威脅 - 動作、冒險和戰鬥模式！

LEGO Star Wars - The Force Awakens (USA).key: LEGO Star Wars - The Force Awakens (USA)
LEGO Star Wars - The Force Awakens (USA).original_name: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens
LEGO Star Wars - The Force Awakens (USA).name: 星際大戰五部曲：帝國大反擊
LEGO Star Wars - The Force Awakens (USA).original_desc: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens marks the triumphant return of the No. 1 LEGO videogame franchise and immerses fans in the new Star Wars adventure like never before. Players can relive the epic action from the blockbuster film in a way that only LEGO can offer, featuring all of the storylines from Star Wars: The Force Awakens, retold through the clever and witty LEGO lens. The game will also feature exclusive playable content that takes players on adventures between Star Wars: Episode VI: Return of the Jedi and Star Wars: The Force Awakens, providing additional insight about the new movie and its characters.
LEGO Star Wars - The Force Awakens (USA).desc: 樂高星球大戰：原力覺醒標誌著第一大樂高電子遊戲系列的凱旋歸來，讓粉絲們以前所未有的方式沉浸在全新的星球大戰冒險中。玩家可以以只有樂高才能提供的方式重溫這部大片中的史詩般的動作，其中包含《星球大戰：原力覺醒》的所有故事情節，並通過巧妙而詼諧的樂高鏡頭重述。該遊戲還將提供獨家可玩內容，帶領玩家在《星球大戰：第六集：絕地歸來》和《星球大戰：原力覺醒》之間進行冒險，提供有關新電影及其角色的更多見解。

Monster Hunter 3 Ultimate (Europe).name: 怪物獵人3終極版
Monster Hunter 3 Ultimate (Europe).original_desc: The popular fantasy action franchise Monster Hunter is now one of the most iconic gaming series in the world selling over 21 million copies worldwide since the series began in 2004. Players take on the role of a hunter and are sent to explore a settlement within the Monster Hunter universe, completing quests on their journey to seek and slay monsters whilst improving their skills and earning equipment upgrades. With many challenging monsters and over 200 quests the latest edition to the series is set to be the most expansive offering to date. Monster Hunter 3 Ultimate utilizes the functionalities of the Nintendo 3DS system to provide players with a truly intuitive hunting experience. The touch screen feature allows players to quickly access in-game books, weapons, field maps and mini games whilst the high quality graphics 3D visuals of Nintendo 3DS powered by the latest iteration of Capcom's MT Framework deliver a unique and stunning world for players to explore. Taking advantage of the portability of Nintendo 3DS, players can exchange their guild card that contains all their hunter's information with other players via StreetPass. Players can experience the world of Monster Hunter alone or in four player local play using Nintendo 3DS. Finding nearby hunters to adventure on quests with is now even easier via the local Nintendo 3DS search feature. Wii U players will be able to enjoy the hunt with Nintendo 3DS players via a local wireless connection. Gamers that own both a Wii U and Nintendo 3DS can take advantage of the inter compatibility of save data between the two consoles, taking the hunt from the living room wherever they go.
Monster Hunter 3 Ultimate (Europe).desc: 廣受歡迎的奇幻動作系列《怪物獵人》自 2004 年推出以來，現已成為世界上最具標誌性的遊戲系列之一，全球銷量超過 2100 萬份。玩家扮演獵人的角色，被派去探索《怪物獵人》宇宙中的定居點，在旅途中完成尋找和殺死怪物的任務，同時提高技能並獲得裝備升級。該系列的最新版本包含許多具有挑戰性的怪物和 200 多個任務，將成為迄今為止最廣泛的產品。《怪物獵人 3 Ultimate》利用任天堂 3DS 系統的功能為玩家提供真正直觀的狩獵體驗。觸摸屏功能使玩家能夠快速訪問遊戲中的書籍、武器、野外地圖和迷你游戲，而由最新版本的 Capcom MT 框架提供支持的 Nintendo 3DS 的高品質圖形 3D 視覺效果為玩家提供了一個獨特而令人驚嘆的世界供探索。利用任天堂 3DS 的便攜性，玩家可以通過 StreetPass 與其他玩家交換包含所有獵人信息的公會卡。玩家可以單獨體驗《怪物獵人》的世界，也可以使用 Nintendo 3DS 進行四人本地遊戲。現在，通過本地 Nintendo 3DS 搜索功能，尋找附近的獵人來冒險任務變得更加容易。Wii U 玩家將能夠通過本地無線連接與 Nintendo 3DS 玩家一起享受狩獵的樂趣。同時擁有 Wii U 和 Nintendo 3DS 的遊戲玩家可以利用兩個遊戲機之間保存數據的相互兼容性，無論他們走到哪裡，都可以在客廳進行狩獵。

Cooking Mama 4 (Europe).name: 烹飪媽媽4
Cooking Mama 4 (Europe).original_desc: Join the original digital chef as she makes her debut on Nintendo 3DS with Cooking Mama 4: Kitchen Magic! From new recipes and ways to play to fresh kitchen activities and dish combinations, the iconic kitchen cutie has some tricks up her sleeve that will magically transform kitchen newbies into master culinary artists! Slice, dice, knead, toss and flip your way through more than 200 unique Touch Screen mini-games as you cook in brand new ways with the Nintendo 3DS gyroscope: crack eggs, flip pans, balance plates and much more. Earn bronze, silver and gold medals while mixing up over 60 recipes that range from side dishes to full meals. Organize, decorate and clean your kitchen while watching surprising 3D events unfold as you prepare each meal.
Cooking Mama 4 (Europe).desc: 與原創數字廚師一起在 Nintendo 3DS 上首次亮相《烹飪媽媽 4：廚房魔法》！從新的食譜和玩法到新鮮的廚房活動和菜餚組合，這位標誌性的廚房小可愛有一些妙招，可以神奇地將廚房新手變成烹飪大師！當您使用 Nintendo 3DS 陀螺儀以全新方式烹飪時，您可以通過 200 多種獨特的觸摸屏迷你游戲進行切片、切丁、揉捏、拋擲和翻轉：打碎雞蛋、翻轉平底鍋、平衡盤等等。混合 60 多種食譜（從配菜到正餐），贏得銅牌、銀牌和金牌。整理、裝飾和清潔您的廚房，同時觀看令人驚奇的 3D 事件在您準備每頓飯菜時展開。

Ace Combat - Assault Horizon Legacy (Eur.name: 皇牌空戰：突擊地平線：遺產
Ace Combat - Assault Horizon Legacy (Eur.original_desc: Ace Combat: Assault Horizon Legacy is a flight-sim / arcade fighter combat action game.  The game is typically played in a 3rd-Person, behind the aircraft, or 1st-Person, inside the cockpit view.  It features series mainstays such as numerous selectable aircraft and the ability to purchase parts and weapons to customize the fighters.  Where Assault Horizon Legacy sets itself apart from current console versions of Assault Horizon in that the gameplay is tipped more in favor of the arcade-style action of the early games in the series rather than focusing on flight-sim characteristics.  Also different from the console versions of Assault Horizon is that this entry takes place in the fictional universe of the older games in the series, rather than real-world locations.
Ace Combat - Assault Horizon Legacy (Eur.desc: 皇牌空戰：突擊地平線遺產是一款飛行模擬/街機戰鬥機格鬥動作遊戲。該遊戲通常以第三人稱（在飛機後面）或第一人稱（在駕駛艙視圖內）進行。它具有系列支柱，例如眾多可選擇的飛機以及購買零件和武器來定制戰鬥機的能力。《突擊地平線：遺產》與當前主機版《突擊地平線》的不同之處在於，遊戲玩法更傾向於該系列早期遊戲的街機風格動作，而不是專注於飛行模擬特徵。與主機版《突擊地平線》的另一個不同之處在於，本作發生在該系列老遊戲的虛構宇宙中，而不是現實世界的地點。

Kingdom Hearts 3D - Dream Drop Distance.name: 王國之心 3D：夢想掉落距離
Kingdom Hearts 3D - Dream Drop Distance.original_desc:
With the threat of the evil Xehanort's return, King Mickey and Yen Sid have begun preparations to combat him.  Their first step is to turn Keyblade wielders Sora and Riku into Keyblade Masters.  Sora and Riku are given the task of completing the Mark of Mastery exam which when completed will help them obtain a great power to aid in the fight against Xehanort.  This test will not be so easy as the two must venture together into seven Sleeping Worlds and find the the Keyholes of Sleep to awaken them.  Along the way they meet new friends and face new enemies in worlds completely new to them.  These challenges will forever test their abilities and lead to an ultimate test to prevent the darkness from overtaken their light.

Dream Drop Distance takes place immediately after the events of Kingdom Hearts II.  Sora learns from a letter he receives from King Mickey that he is the only one who can save those lost who are connected to him; referring to the characters Ventus, Aqua, and Terra from Birth by Sleep.  Sora and Riku travel to worlds based on settings from various Disney properties such as La Cité des Cloches (The Hunchback of Notre Dame), Prankster's Paradise (Pinnochio), Symphony of Sorcery (Fantasia) and The Grid (Tron).  

The game utilizes a gameplay mechanic called Flowmotion which allows your character to quickly bounce off walls and scale buildings in short bursts of speed.  A Drop system has been implemented which changes the control of your character to either Sora or Riku after a certain amount of time.  While playing as Sora/Riku and the Drop Gauge reaches 0, your character will switch to the other who can be in an entirely different world at a completely different time.  The game is an action-RPG with gameplay similar to Birth by Sleep in which it uses the Command Deck system.  The Command Deck lets you create your own customized deck of actions such as items and spells for quick use.  Dream Eaters are introduced as new enemies.  Some of these Dream Eaters known as Spirits can be recruited and further enhance your abilities in-game by strengthening your powers and giving you new attacks.
Kingdom Hearts 3D - Dream Drop Distance.desc:
隨著邪惡的 Xehanort 捲土重來的威脅，米奇國王和 Yen Sid 開始準備對抗他。他們的第一步是將鍵刃持有者 Sora 和 Riku 轉變為鍵刃大師。Sora 和 Riku 接到了完成精通標記考試的任務，完成後將幫助他們獲得強大的力量來幫助對抗 Xehanort。這項測試不會那麼容易，因為兩人必須一起冒險進入七個睡眠世界並找到睡眠鑰匙孔以喚醒他們。一路上，他們在全新的世界中結識了新朋友並面對新敵人。這些挑戰將永遠考驗他們的能力，並導致最終的考驗，以防止黑暗取代他們的光明。

《Dream Drop Distance》發生在《王國之心 II》事件之後。索拉從米奇國王的一封信中得知，他是唯一能夠拯救那些與他有聯繫的迷失者的人；指《夢中降生》中的角色文圖斯 (Ventus)、阿克婭 (Aqua) 和泰拉 (Terra)。Sora 和 Riku 前往以各種迪士尼作品為背景的世界，例如 La Cité des Cloches（巴黎圣母院）、惡作劇者的天堂（匹諾曹）、魔法交響曲（幻想曲）和網格（創）。

該遊戲採用了一種名為“Flowmotion”的遊戲機制，可以讓你的角色快速從牆壁上彈起並以短時間內的速度攀爬建築物。已經實施了掉落系統，該系統會在一段時間後將角色的控制權更改為Sora或Riku。當扮演Sora/Riku並且掉落量達到0時，你的角色將切換到另一個可以在完全不同的時間處於完全不同的世界的角色。該遊戲是一款動作角色扮演遊戲，其遊戲玩法類似於《夢中降生》，其中使用了命令甲板系統。命令甲板可讓您創建自己的自定義動作甲板，例如快速使用的物品和咒語。食夢者作為新敵人出現。一些被稱為“靈魂”的食夢者可以被招募，並通過增強你的力量和給予你新的攻擊來進一步增強你在遊戲中的能力。

Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic.key: Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games (Europe)
Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic.original_name: Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games
Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic.name: 馬里奧與索尼克在 2012 年倫敦奧運會
Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic.original_desc: Arriving on Nintendo's new handheld system for the first time ever Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games contains over 50 original Olympic themed events playable in both single and multiplayer modes. Bringing a whole new dimension to the Mario & Sonic universe, the glasses-free 3D visuals and the unique control systems mean there are plenty of new and exciting ways to compete for a coveted gold medal!
Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic.desc: 2012 年倫敦奧運會上首次登陸任天堂全新掌上系統的《馬里奧與索尼克》包含 50 多個原創奧運主題賽事，可在單人和多人模式下進行。裸眼 3D 視覺效果和獨特的控制系統為《馬里奧與索尼克》宇宙帶來了全新的維度，這意味著有很多新的、令人興奮的方式來爭奪令人垂涎的金牌！

Luigi's Mansion 2 (Europe).name: 路易吉洋樓2
Luigi's Mansion 2 (Europe).original_desc:
After the happenings of Luigi's Mansion, Luigi once again has to put on his ghostbusting gear. This time he visits Evershade Valley, where the destruction of the Dark Moon caused all ghosts to become hostile to humans. Luigi is hired by the eccentric professor Gadd to visit five haunted mansions to retrieve the Dark Moon parts.

Luigi's weapon of choice is vacuum device called PolterGust 5000 which is used to fight against the numerous ghost enemies. The basic procedure is always the same: Luigi has to stun the ghosts with the flashlight (in contrast to the predecessor, now the position and angle is important) so he can vacuum them in. Of course the ghosts struggle against it, so their movement has to be countered with the analogue stick. There are different kinds of enemies which require a variation of tactics, e.g. some ghosts have sunglasses which have to be removed first and others are only vulnerable briefly. There are also multi-stage bossfights. 

The PolterGust 5000 is also used to solve puzzles, for example by sucking in a stove and using the flames to ignite something else. It is also a good idea to use the vacuum device on physical objects in the mansions in order to find secret passages or treasure. When Luigi picks up enough treasure, the PolterGust 5000 is automatically upgraded.

Besides the campaign, there is also a multiplayer mode which takes place in the ScareScraper, mansion with 25 floors. The available modes are hunter (sucking in as many ghosts as possible in a limited amount of time), rush (finding the exit in a limited amount of time; clocks can be picked up to extend the time limit) and polterpup (tracking down polterpulps, invisible ghosts, with the flashlight).
Luigi's Mansion 2 (Europe).desc:
路易吉洋館發生事件後，路易吉再次穿上他的捉鬼裝備。這次他來到了永影谷，闇月的毀滅導致所有鬼魂都對人類產生了敵意。路易吉受古怪教授加德的僱傭，前往五座鬼屋取回闇月部件。

路易吉選擇的武器是名為 PolterGust 5000 的真空裝置，用於對抗眾多幽靈敵人。基本程序始終是相同的：路易吉必須用手電筒擊暈幽靈（與前作相比，現在位置和角度很重要），這樣他就可以將它們吸進去。當然，幽靈會與之抗爭，因此必須用模擬搖桿來對抗它們的移動。有不同類型的敵人，需要不同的戰術，例如有些鬼魂戴著墨鏡，必須先摘下墨鏡，而另一些鬼魂則只會短暫受到傷害。還有多階段的boss戰。

PolterGust 5000 還用於解決謎題，例如吸入爐子並使用火焰點燃其他東西。在宅邸中的物體上使用真空裝置來尋找秘密通道或寶藏也是一個好主意。當 Luigi 拾取足夠的寶藏時，PolterGust 5000 會自動升級。

除了戰役之外，還有多人遊戲模式，該模式發生在 25 層樓的 ScareScraper 豪宅中。可用的模式有獵人（在有限的時間內吸進盡可能多的鬼魂）、衝刺（在有限的時間內找到出口；可以拿起時鐘來延長時間限制）和 polterpup（用手電筒追踪 polterpulps，隱形鬼魂）。

Monster Hunter Generations (USA).name: 怪物獵人世代
Monster Hunter Generations (USA).original_desc: Monster Hunter Generations is an action role-playing video game developed and published by Capcom for the Nintendo 3DS. Announced in May 2015, the game was released in Japan in November 2015, under the title Monster Hunter Cross, and was released internationally in July 2016. Like other titles in the Monster Hunter series, players undertake quests that involve hunting dangerous creatures. Major additions in this installment include special attacks, new combat styles, and the ability to play as Felynes, who have traditionally only appeared as a companion to the player.
Monster Hunter Generations (USA).desc: 《怪物獵人世代》是一款由 Capcom 為任天堂 3DS 開發和發行的動作角色扮演視頻遊戲。該遊戲於 2015 年 5 月發布，並於 2015 年 11 月在日本發布，遊戲名稱為《怪物獵人 Cross》，並於 2016 年 7 月在全球發布。與《怪物獵人》系列中的其他遊戲一樣，玩家將承擔涉及狩獵危險生物的任務。本作的主要新增內容包括特殊攻擊、新的戰斗方式以及扮演貓的能力，貓傳統上只作為玩家的同伴出現。

Fire Emblem Echoes Shadows of Valentia (.key: Fire Emblem Echoes Shadows of Valentia (USA)
Fire Emblem Echoes Shadows of Valentia (.original_name: Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia
Fire Emblem Echoes Shadows of Valentia (.name: 火焰之纹章 回声 另一位英雄王
Fire Emblem Echoes Shadows of Valentia (.original_desc:
A tale of two armies with one destiny

In a continent that was torn asunder by warring gods, guide two armies through brutal tactical battlesâ€”as this reimagined RPG epic invades the West! Uncover the intertwining stories of Alm and Celica, engage foes, fend off dragons, and explore 3D dungeons. Your prowess will grow as you master this melding of modern and legacy Fire Emblemâ„¢ gameplay.

Alm and Celica lead separate armies united by a common goal: to stop the war and unify Valentia. Each army has its own path, units, and supplies, so balance their needs. Here, battle is waged in the traditions of elder Fire Emblemâ„¢ games, when the rules of battle were simpler, yet the challenge formidable as ever. When you encounter a dungeon, explore it in action-adventure style: smash false walls, break pots, or ambush enemies with a slash of your sword. You never know; you may stumble upon some uncommon itemsâ€¦or a hidden tactical battle with a brutal boss.
Fire Emblem Echoes Shadows of Valentia (.desc:
兩支軍隊同命運的故事

在一個被戰神撕裂的大陸上，引導兩支軍隊進行殘酷的戰術戰鬥——這款重新想像的角色扮演史詩入侵了西方！揭開阿爾姆和塞莉卡相互交織的故事，與敵人交戰，擊退巨龍，並探索 3D 地下城。當你掌握了現代與傳統火焰紋章™遊戲玩法的融合時，你的實力將會不斷增強。

阿爾姆和塞莉卡領導著各自的軍隊，為了一個共同的目標而團結起來：停止戰爭並統一瓦倫西亞。每支軍隊都有自己的路線、單位和補給，因此要平衡他們的需求。在這裡，戰鬥延續了《火焰紋章™》遊戲的傳統，戰鬥規則更加簡單，但挑戰卻一如既往地艱鉅。當你遇到地下城時，以動作冒險風格探索它：粉碎假牆、打碎罐子，或者用劍伏擊敵人。你永遠不知道；你可能會偶然發現一些不常見的物品……或者與殘酷的老闆進行隱藏的戰術戰鬥。

Pokemon Omega Ruby (USA).name: 口袋妖怪歐米茄紅寶石
Pokemon Omega Ruby (USA).original_desc:
In this enhanced remake of Pokémon Ruby Version, players travel throughout the Hoenn region on a journey to become a Pokémon Master. Like the original, the goal is to challenge the eight Pokémon Gyms of the Hoenn League and earn badges from their Gym Leaders, then take on the Elite Four and the Champion. However, the world is endangered when the villainous Team Magma tries to expand the continents by resurrecting the ancient Legendary Pokémon Groudon.

Aside from technical upgrades, the game is drastically changed in certain aspects. The Hoenn Pokédex is changed to add the evolutionary relatives of Pokémon from its original incarnation. Some Pokédex entries are also changed. Mega Evolution plays a major part of the storyline, and a new form change is introduced in the form of Primal Reversion, exclusive to Groudon and Kyogre. Some characters have had major redesigns in terms of appearance. Instead of roaming Hoenn after defeating the Champion as in the original, Latios automatically joins the player's party after summoning the player Southern Island. Latios can be used to soar through the skies of Hoenn, taking the player to locations known as Mirage Spots that cannot be reached otherwise. Pokémon Contests return under the name "Contest Spectacular" and have some new mechanics, while the basic format is largely the same.

After the main story, a new chapter called the Delta Episode is unlocked, allowing the player to once again save Hoenn from disaster. Finally, the Battle Tower is replaced by the Battle Resort, which features tough Trainers as well as a replica of the Battle Maison from Pokémon X and Y.
Pokemon Omega Ruby (USA).desc:
在這款《神奇寶貝紅寶石版》的增強版重製版中，玩家將穿越豐緣地區，踏上成為神奇寶貝大師的旅程。與原版一樣，目標是挑戰豐緣聯盟的八個神奇寶貝道館，並從道館領袖那裡獲得徽章，然後挑戰精英四強和冠軍。然而，當邪惡的岩漿隊試圖通過復活古老的傳奇神奇寶貝固拉多來擴張大陸時，世界正面臨危險。

除了技術升級之外，遊戲在某些方面也發生了巨大的變化。豐緣圖鑑經過更改，從其原始版本中添加了神奇寶貝的進化親屬。一些圖鑑條目也發生了變化。超級進化是故事情節的主要部分，並且以原始回歸的形式引入了新的形態變化，這是固拉多和蓋歐卡獨有的。一些角色在外觀上進行了重大重新設計。拉帝歐斯不再像原作那樣在擊敗冠軍後在豐緣漫遊，而是在召喚玩家南島後自動加入玩家的隊伍。拉帝歐斯可以用來在豐緣的天空中翱翔，將玩家帶到被稱為幻影點的地方，否則無法到達。神奇寶貝大賽以“大賽壯觀”的名義回歸，並有一些新的機制，而基本格式基本相同。

主線故事結束後，名為“Delta Episode”的新章節被解鎖，讓玩家能夠再次將豐緣從災難中拯救出來。最後，對戰塔被對戰度假村所取代，其中有強大的訓練師以及《神奇寶貝 X》和《Y》中對戰屋的複製品。

Paper Mario - Sticker Star (Europe).name: 紙片馬里奧 : 貼紙明星
Paper Mario - Sticker Star (Europe).original_desc: On the day of the annual Sticker Fest, Bowser decides to pull a prank and scatters six Royal Stickers across the land. To retrieve these mysterious, magical stickers, which are now stuck onto Bowser and his underlings, Mario sets off on an adventure with Kersti, a sticker fairy, visiting prairies, deserts, forests, snowy mountains and volcanoes around the world.
Paper Mario - Sticker Star (Europe).desc: 在一年一度的貼紙節當天，鮑澤決定搞個惡作劇，將六張皇家貼紙撒在了整個土地上。為了取回這些貼在鮑澤和他的部下身上的神秘魔法貼紙，馬里奧與貼紙仙子克斯蒂一起踏上了冒險之旅，參觀了世界各地的草原、沙漠、森林、雪山和火山。

Pokemon Sun (USA).name: 口袋妖怪太陽
Pokemon Sun (USA).original_desc:
Pokémon Sun, along with Pokémon Moon, marks the start of the seventh generation of the Pokémon franchise. The game takes place in the Alola region, an archipelago whose culture, geography, and native wildlife are based on those of Hawaii. A number of Alola's native Pokémon have never been seen before, bringing the series' total number of Pokémon species to over 800.

The story follows a customizable protagonist who has just moved to the region and received their first Pokémon. What differs from past installments is that instead of the usual challenge of defeating eight Gyms, Alola is host to the island challenge, in which trainers face seven trials that test many other skills in addition to battling prowess. Only after clearing the seven trials and defeating the four island Kahunas can a trainer be called a champion. As the player character embarks on their island challenge, they are joined by a local boy named Hau, another newcomer to Alola named Lillie, and the mysterious Pokémon Cosmog that is under Lillie's protection. The group is forced to deal with Team Skull, a group of thugs who commit petty crimes under the leadership of their ruthless boss; the Aether Foundation, a wildlife conservation group with connections to Cosmog; and dangerous, otherworldly creatures called the Ultra Beasts.

As usual for a new pair of Pokémon games, Sun and Moon boast a number of new and improved features. HMs are now replaced by Ride Pokémon, which are unlocked over the course of the story and can be called upon at any time to provide transportation and clear obstacles. Hyper Training allows players to boost their Pokémon's individual values, hidden values that impact a Pokémon's potential for stat growth and are otherwise immutable. The new Battle Royal mode pits four trainers against each other in a free-for-all fight where the goal is to score the most KOs while trying not to let one's own Pokémon faint. A group of islands called Poké Pelago allow the player's Pokémon to play and collect items while they aren't in the active party, and each island can be upgraded to provide more and better rewards. Lastly, a location called the Festival Plaza acts as the multiplayer hub, and combines features from prior games' Join Avenue and PSS systems.
Pokemon Sun (USA).desc:
《精靈寶可夢太陽》和《精靈寶可夢月亮》標誌著第七代《精靈寶可夢》系列的開始。遊戲發生在阿羅拉群島，該群島的文化、地理和本土野生動物均以夏威夷為基礎。許多阿羅拉本土神奇寶貝以前從未見過，使該系列的神奇寶貝種類總數超過 800 種。

這個故事講述了一個可定制的主角，他剛剛搬到該地區並收到了他們的第一隻神奇寶貝。與以往的不同之處在於，阿羅拉不再是擊敗八個道館的通常挑戰，而是舉辦島嶼挑戰，其中訓練師面臨七項考驗，除了戰鬥能力之外，還測試許多其他技能。只有通過七大試煉，擊敗四島卡胡納斯，訓練師才能稱為冠軍。當玩家角色開始他們的島嶼挑戰時，他們加入了一個名叫 Hau 的當地男孩、另一個名叫 Lillie 的阿羅拉新人，以及受到 Lillie 保護的神秘神奇寶貝 Cosmog。該小組被迫與骷髏隊打交道，這是一群在無情老闆的領導下犯下輕微罪行的暴徒； Aether 基金會，一個與 Cosmog 有聯繫的野生動物保護組織；還有危險的、超凡脫俗的生物，稱為終極野獸。

和往常一樣，對於新的神奇寶貝遊戲來說，《太陽》和《月亮》擁有許多新的和改進的功能。HM 現在被騎乘神奇寶貝 (Ride Pokémon) 所取代，它們在故事的過程中解鎖，可以隨時被召喚來提供運輸和清除障礙。超級訓練允許玩家提高他們的神奇寶貝的個人價值，這些隱藏的價值會影響神奇寶貝的統計增長潛力，並且在其他方面是不可改變的。新的大逃殺模式讓四名訓練師在一場混戰中相互對抗，目標是獲得最多的 KO 次數，同時盡量不讓自己的神奇寶貝暈倒。一組名為“Poké Pelago”的島嶼允許玩家的神奇寶貝在不在活動隊伍中時玩遊戲並收集物品，並且每個島嶼都可以升級以提供更多更好的獎勵。最後，一個名為 Festival Plaza 的地點充當多人遊戲中心，並結合了之前遊戲的 Join Avenue 和 PSS 系統的功能。

Cars 2 (europe) (En,Fi,Sv,No,Da) Decrypt.name: 极品飞车：地下狂飙2
Cars 2 (europe) (En,Fi,Sv,No,Da) Decrypt.original_desc: Inspired by the upcoming DisneyPixar animated film, Cars 2: The Video Game lets players jump into the Cars 2 universe with some of their favorite Cars personalities in exotic locations around the globe.
Cars 2 (europe) (En,Fi,Sv,No,Da) Decrypt.desc: 受到即將上映的迪士尼皮克斯動畫電影的啟發，《汽車總動員 2：電子遊戲》讓玩家與他們最喜歡的汽車總動員人物一起進入全球異國他鄉的汽車總動員 2 宇宙。

Cave Story 3D (Europe).name: 洞穴故事 3d
Cave Story 3D (Europe).original_desc: Having received tremendous acclaim in its previous releases on PC and WiiWare, Cave Story, an indie side scrolling 2D action game, now makes its way into an all new dimension with Cave Story 3D for Nintendo 3DS. At once both a throwback to classic 2D action platformers and also the potential future of the genre, Cave Story 3D blends tight controls, superb level design, and excellent story and presentation to deliver a memorable, addicting retro experience!
Cave Story 3D (Europe).desc: 《Cave Story》是一款獨立橫向捲軸 2D 動作遊戲，在之前的 PC 和 WiiWare 版本中獲得了巨大好評，現在憑藉適用於 Nintendo 3DS 的《Cave Story 3D》進入了一個全新的維度。Cave Story 3D 既是對經典 2D 動作平台遊戲的回歸，也是該類型的潛在未來，它融合了嚴格的控制、精湛的關卡設計以及出色的故事和演示，帶來令人難忘、令人上癮的複古體驗！

Mario and Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic.key: Mario and Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games (Europe)
Mario and Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic.original_name: Mario & Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games
Mario and Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic.name: 馬里奧和索尼克在 2016 年里約奧運會上
Mario and Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic.original_desc: Compete On-the-go with Mario and Sonic! All of your favorite Mario? and Sonic characters are ready to join the fun in Rio de Janeiro, host of the Olympic Games in 2016. Then take the rivalry on the road with this portable collection of supercharged events like Soccer, Table Tennis, or test your skills in a challenging game of Golf. Take on fun and exciting events set throughout host city Rio de Janeiro. Join Mario, Sonic and your favorite characters to take on new challenging events like Soccer and Beach Volleyball.
