Soccer is a popular sport in Brazil where the Rio 2016 Olympic Games are set. Golf returns to the Olympic Games for the first time in 112 years; enjoy the event exclusively in the Nintendo 3DS version of Mario & Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games.
Mario and Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic.desc: 與馬里奧和索尼克一起隨時隨地競爭！所有你最喜歡的馬里奧？索尼克和索尼克角色已準備好參加 2016 年奧運會主辦國里約熱內盧的歡樂之旅。然後參加足球、乒乓球等一系列超強賽事的便攜式遊戲，在公路上展開競爭，或者在具有挑戰性的高爾夫比賽中測試您的技能。參加在主辦城市里約熱內盧舉辦的有趣而激動人心的活動。與馬里奧、索尼克和您最喜歡的角色一起參加足球和沙灘排球等新的挑戰性活動。足球是 2016 年里約奧運會舉辦地巴西的一項熱門運動。高爾夫時隔112年首次重返奧運會；獨家在任天堂 3DS 版《馬里奧與索尼克》中體驗 2016 年里約奧運會的盛況。

Mario Party - Island Tour (Europe).name: 馬里奧派對島之旅
Mario Party - Island Tour (Europe).original_desc:
Mario Party: Island Tour lets you take the fun on the road with your Nintendo 3DS system!

Face off against friends and family in the all-new, ultimate Mario Party â€“ a portable minigame extravaganza thatâ€™s bursting with gameplay possibilities. If youâ€™ve never played a Mario Party game before, youâ€™re in for a treat.

Thereâ€™s always something new to see on the Party Islands.
In this ultimate showdown you can take on the road, blaze through the 7 new game boards, some of which take just minutes to play. Wrangle goombas and blast out of cannons as you tilt, tap, and draw through new minigames harnessing the unique functionality of Nintendo 3DS. Compete in new multiplayer modes including mind bending puzzles, minigame challenges, or enter a whole new reality with AR Card play for up to 4 players*. Whether in single or multiplayer, this is a portable party that never ends.
Mario Party - Island Tour (Europe).desc:
《馬里奧派對：島嶼之旅》讓您使用 Nintendo 3DS 系統享受旅途的樂趣！

在全新的終極《馬里奧派對》中與朋友和家人對決——這是一款充滿遊戲可能性的便攜式迷你游戲盛宴。如果您以前從未玩過《馬里奧派對》遊戲，那麼您一定會大飽眼福。

在派對群島上總有新的東西可看。
在這場終極對決中，您可以上路，在 7 個新遊戲版塊中大放異彩，其中一些遊戲只需幾分鐘即可玩完。利用 Nintendo 3DS 的獨特功能，通過傾斜、點擊和繪製的新迷你游戲，與 goombas 爭吵並發射大砲。在新的多人遊戲模式中競爭，包括令人費解的謎題、迷你游戲挑戰，或通過 AR 卡牌遊戲進入全新的現實，最多可容納 4 名玩家*。無論是單人遊戲還是多人遊戲，這都是一場永無休止的便攜式聚會。

Dragon Quest VIII - Journey of the Curse.key: Dragon Quest VIII - Journey of the Cursed King (USA)
Dragon Quest VIII - Journey of the Curse.original_name: Dragon Quest VIII: Journey of the Cursed King
Dragon Quest VIII - Journey of the Curse.name: 勇者鬥惡龍 VIII：被詛咒的國王之旅
Dragon Quest VIII - Journey of the Curse.original_desc:
The court jester Dhoulmagus of the kingdom of Trodain stole a powerful magical scepter sealed beneath the royal castle. Using the power of the scepter, Dhoulmagus destroyed the castle, placed a curse upon the kingdom and its people, and turned King Trode into a troll and the princess into a horse. A sole surviving castle guard journeys with the king, the princess, a reformed bandit named Yangus and a few other companions in search of the evil jester and a way to break the curse. 

Dragon Quest VIII: Journey of the Cursed King is a traditional Japanese-style role-playing game with random enemy encounters, simple turn-based combat mechanics, and management of a party consisting of four characters, each belonging to a clearly defined class. Unlike its predecessors in the series and most Japanese RPGs in general, the game features a continuous world with fairly vast landscapes and integrated towns and dungeons, as opposed to world map traveling and locations represented by icons. The game features full camera rotation and optional first-person view. Like in the previous Dragon Quest games, many objects can be interacted with; for example, barrels can be physically lifted, carried, and broken, to reveal items hidden within.

In addition to experience points, the player receives skill points from battles, which can be manually allocated into a skill category of the player's choice. These categories include three different kinds of weapons, fisticuffs, and a discipline unique to each character. After a required amount of skill points has been invested into a particular category, the correspondent character learns a new ability or becomes more proficient with the chosen weapon. The Alchemy Pot system allows players to gather recipes and mix items to create new ones.

The international version of the game features several updates to the original Japanese version, including voice acting, graphic menu, symphonic soundtracks, and flashier effects.
Dragon Quest VIII - Journey of the Curse.desc:
特羅丹王國的宮廷小丑杜爾馬格斯偷走了封印在皇家城堡下方的強大魔法權杖。杜爾馬格斯利用權杖的力量摧毀了城堡，對王國及其人民下了詛咒，並將特羅德國王變成了巨魔，公主變成了馬。唯一倖存的城堡守衛與國王、公主、改過自新的強盜楊格斯以及其他幾個同伴一起踏上旅程，尋找邪惡的小丑和打破詛咒的方法。

《勇者鬥惡龍 VIII：詛咒之王之旅》是一款傳統的日式角色扮演遊戲，具有隨機的敵人遭遇、簡單的回合製戰鬥機制以及由四個角色組成的隊伍的管理，每個角色都屬於明確定義的類別。與該系列的前作和大多數日本角色扮演遊戲不同，該遊戲具有一個連續的世界，具有相當廣闊的景觀和集成的城鎮和地下城，而不是世界地圖旅行和由圖標代表的地點。該遊戲具有完整的鏡頭旋轉和可選的第一人稱視角。與之前的《勇者鬥惡龍》遊戲一樣，許多物體都可以進行交互；例如，桶可以被物理提起、攜帶和打破，以顯示隱藏在其中的物品。

除了經驗值之外，玩家還可以從戰鬥中獲得技能點，這些技能點可以手動分配到玩家選擇的技能類別中。這些類別包括三種不同類型的武器、拳頭以及每個角色獨特的紀律。在將所需數量的技能點投入到特定類別後，相應的角色會學習新的能力或變得更加精通所選的武器。煉金罐系統允許玩家收集配方並混合物品來創造新的。

該遊戲的國際版對原始日語版本進行了多項更新，包括配音、圖形菜單、交響樂配樂和更華麗的效果。

Luigis Mansion - Dark Moon (USA).name: 路易吉洋樓：闇月
Luigis Mansion - Dark Moon (USA).original_desc:
After the happenings of Luigi's Mansion, Luigi once again has to put on his ghostbusting gear. This time he visits Evershade Valley, where the destruction of the Dark Moon caused all ghosts to become hostile to humans. Luigi is hired by the eccentric professor Gadd to visit five haunted mansions to retrieve the Dark Moon parts.

Luigi's weapon of choice is vacuum device called PolterGust 5000 which is used to fight against the numerous ghost enemies. The basic procedure is always the same: Luigi has to stun the ghosts with the flashlight (in contrast to the predecessor, now the position and angle is important) so he can vacuum them in. Of course the ghosts struggle against it, so their movement has to be countered with the analogue stick. There are different kinds of enemies which require a variation of tactics, e.g. some ghosts have sunglasses which have to be removed first and others are only vulnerable briefly. There are also multi-stage bossfights. 

The PolterGust 5000 is also used to solve puzzles, for example by sucking in a stove and using the flames to ignite something else. It is also a good idea to use the vacuum device on physical objects in the mansions in order to find secret passages or treasure. When Luigi picks up enough treasure, the PolterGust 5000 is automatically upgraded.

Besides the campaign, there is also a multiplayer mode which takes place in the ScareScraper, mansion with 25 floors. The available modes are hunter (sucking in as many ghosts as possible in a limited amount of time), rush (finding the exit in a limited amount of time; clocks can be picked up to extend the time limit) and polterpup (tracking down polterpulps, invisible ghosts, with the flashlight).
Luigis Mansion - Dark Moon (USA).desc:
路易吉洋館發生事件後，路易吉再次穿上他的捉鬼裝備。這次他來到了永影谷，闇月的毀滅導致所有鬼魂都對人類產生了敵意。路易吉受古怪教授加德的僱傭，前往五座鬼屋取回闇月部件。

路易吉選擇的武器是名為 PolterGust 5000 的真空裝置，用於對抗眾多幽靈敵人。基本程序始終是相同的：路易吉必須用手電筒擊暈幽靈（與前作相比，現在位置和角度很重要），這樣他就可以將它們吸進去。當然，幽靈會與之抗爭，因此必須用模擬搖桿來對抗它們的移動。有不同類型的敵人，需要不同的戰術，例如有些鬼魂戴著墨鏡，必須先摘下墨鏡，而另一些鬼魂則只會短暫受到傷害。還有多階段的boss戰。

PolterGust 5000 還用於解決謎題，例如吸入爐子並使用火焰點燃其他東西。在宅邸中的物體上使用真空裝置來尋找秘密通道或寶藏也是一個好主意。當 Luigi 拾取足夠的寶藏時，PolterGust 5000 會自動升級。

除了戰役之外，還有多人遊戲模式，該模式發生在 25 層樓的 ScareScraper 豪宅中。可用的模式有獵人（在有限的時間內吸進盡可能多的鬼魂）、衝刺（在有限的時間內找到出口；可以拿起時鐘來延長時間限制）和 polterpup（用手電筒追踪 polterpulps，隱形鬼魂）。

Culdcept Revolt (USA).name: 文化概念
Culdcept Revolt (USA).original_desc:
Culdcept is a hybrid board/card game where the objective is to generate the most mana before making it back to the castle.

Each player starts out with a deck of 50 cards. Card types range from monster cards (e.g. Skeleton), which are used to accumulate territory on the board to increase your mana; Equipment (e.g. Chain Mail), which will boost your monsters' abilities when they battle; and Magic (e.g. Holy Word 0), which can be used to help you or hinder the other players on the board. When a player lands on another player's monster, he/she can challenge it to a battle in an attempt to take over the territory. If the attacker wins, he/she gets the space on the board and additional mana.

There are more than sixteen different game boards, each with different rules and layouts (such as the maximum number on dice rolls, the elements on the board, etc.)
Culdcept Revolt (USA).desc:
Culdcept 是一款混合棋盤/紙牌遊戲，其目標是在返回城堡之前產生最多的法力。

每個玩家一開始都有一副 50 張牌。卡牌類型包括怪物卡（例如骷髏），用於在棋盤上積累領土以增加法力；裝備（例如鎖子甲），可以增強怪物戰鬥時的能力；和魔法（例如聖言0），可以用來幫助你或阻礙棋盤上的其他玩家。當一名玩家落在另一名玩家的怪物身上時，他/她可以向該怪物發起戰鬥，試圖佔領該領土。如果攻擊者獲勝，他/她將獲得棋盤上的空間和額外的法力。

有超過十六種不同的遊戲板，每種都有不同的規則和佈局（例如骰子滾動的最大數量，板上的元素等）

Pac-Man & Galaga Dimensions (Europe).name: 吃豆人和加拉加尺寸
Pac-Man & Galaga Dimensions (Europe).original_desc: PAC-MAN and Galaga bring their iconic gameplay to spectacular 3D in an exciting six game package for the Nintendo 3DS! Enjoy classic hits PAC-MAN, PAC-MAN Championship Edition, Galaga, and Galaga Legions, or play two brand new games developed exclusively for the Nintendo 3DS. In PAC-MAN Tilt, move PAC-MAN through stages filled with obstacles, platforms and ghosts with tilt controls. Flippers, platforms and power pellets help PAC-MAN jump, flip, swing, and eat his way to the finish line. Rid space of the incoming Galaga army by shooting down enemies in an exciting 3D skirmish in Galaga 3D Impact!
Pac-Man & Galaga Dimensions (Europe).desc: PAC-MAN 和 Galaga 將他們的標誌性遊戲玩法帶入令人興奮的 3D 3D 遊戲中，為 Nintendo 3DS 推出了令人興奮的六款遊戲套裝！享受經典熱門 PAC-MAN、PAC-MAN 冠軍版、Galaga 和 Galaga Legions，或者玩專為 Nintendo 3DS 開發的兩款全新遊戲。在 PAC-MAN Tilt 中，通過傾斜控制移動 PAC-MAN 通過充滿障礙物、平台和幽靈的舞台。腳蹼、平台和動力丸幫助 PAC-MAN 跳躍、翻轉、擺動和吃食，直至終點線。在 Galaga 3D Impact 中，在激動人心的 3D 小衝突中擊落敵人，消滅來襲的 Galaga 軍隊！

LBX Little Battlers eXperience (Europe).name: LBX：小小戰士體驗
LBX Little Battlers eXperience (Europe).original_desc:
Collect, build and battle your palm-sized robot. Play as Van Yamano, a young boy who comes upon a unique LBX - a complex, customizable, palm-sized robot. Use it - and team up with familiar characters from the hit TV series - to take down the evil corporation known as the New Dawn Raisers.

Features:
-Collect and build your own palm-sized robot from more than 4,000 parts to create a one-of-a-kind LBX
-Choose from more than 130 different complete sets of matching parts, or mix and match.
-Customize both external parts and interior parts individually to enhance your LBXs capabilities.
-Battle as your LBX against friends and foes in third-person view with local wireless multiplayer mode.
-Battle other LBX models in 20 different arenas with unique environmental characteristics.
-In local wireless multiplayer play, up to six players can battle using a variety of different rules
LBX Little Battlers eXperience (Europe).desc:
收集、建造並與你的手掌大小的機器人進行戰鬥。扮演 Van Yamano，一個小男孩，他遇到了一個獨特的 LBX——一個複雜的、可定制的、手掌大小的機器人。使用它 - 並與熱門電視劇中熟悉的角色合作 - 摧毀名為“新黎明崛起者”的邪惡公司。

特點：
-用 4,000 多個零件收集並建造您自己的手掌大小的機器人，打造出獨一無二的 LBX
- 從超過 130 種不同的全套匹配零件中進行選擇，或混合搭配。
- 單獨定制外部零件和內部零件，以增強您的 LBX 功能。
- 在本地無線多人遊戲模式中，以第三人稱視角，扮演 LBX 與朋友和敵人作戰。
- 在 20 個具有獨特環境特徵的不同競技場中與其他 LBX 模型對戰。
- 在本地無線多人遊戲中，最多六名玩家可以使用各種不同的規則進行戰鬥

Hyrule Warriors Legends (USA).name: 海拉爾勇士傳奇
Hyrule Warriors Legends (USA).original_desc:
Cut down entire legions of enemies as fan-favorite Legend of Zelda characters using powerful moves as Hyrule Warriors comes to the Nintendo 3DS. Control multiple characters to enhance your strategies and enjoy new story elements with playable characters from The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker, such as Tetra, King Daphnes, and more.

War rages as the delicate balance of the Triforce is disrupted. The kingdom of Hyrule is once again being torn apart by a dark power, this time lead by Sorceress Cia. Now it's up to the legendary hero Link to face hordes of enemies and find the missing Princess Zelda. Advance the story to unlock new playable characters, each with unique moves and weapon types. Collect Rupees and other useful items to upgrade weapons and craft badges, which you can use to bolster each warrior's abilities.
Hyrule Warriors Legends (USA).desc:
在任天堂 3DS 上，海拉爾無雙 (Hyrule Warriors) 登場，扮演深受粉絲喜愛的《塞爾達傳說》角色，使用強大的招式消滅大批敵人。控制多個角色來增強你的策略，並通過《塞爾達傳說：風之杖》中的可玩角色（例如 Tetra、King Daphnes 等）享受新的故事元素。

三角力量的微妙平衡被破壞，戰爭愈演愈烈。海拉魯王國再次被黑暗力量撕裂，這次由女巫西亞領導。現在，傳奇英雄林克需要面對成群的敵人並找到失踪的塞爾達公主。推動故事發展，解鎖新的可玩角色，每個角色都有獨特的動作和武器類型。收集盧比和其他有用的物品來升級武器和製作徽章，您可以用它們來增強每個戰士的能力。

Bella Sara - The Magical Horse Adventure.key: Bella Sara - The Magical Horse Adventures (Europe)
Bella Sara - The Magical Horse Adventure.original_name: Bella Sara : The Magical Horse Adventures
Bella Sara - The Magical Horse Adventure.name: 貝拉薩拉：魔馬歷險記

Alliance Alive, The (USA).name: 聯盟還活著
Alliance Alive, The (USA).original_desc:
The makers of The Legend of Legacy bring the classic JRPG back to form in The Alliance Alive, a new adventure that evokes the nostalgia of the JRPG greats by offering huge world-exploration, an intertwining story of 9 protagonists, and well-designed battle mechanics.


One thousand years ago, Daemons invaded the world of Humans. They subjugated Humanity and created the Great Barrier to separate the realms. The world was thrown into upheaval, and the Dark Current was born. Humanity was decimated and now Daemons rule atop a hierarchical society. However, the time for resistance has come. The world is about to change yet again...


A World Like No Other


Built on a sprawling world brimming with numerous secrets to discover,players will need to establish and unite guilds throughout the four realms while battling the Daemons.


Engage in Unique Combat


Use the "Ignition" system, a part of the turn-based combat that allows 
for deep customization and nuanced gameplay, to reach an enhanced state 
and deliver devastating Final Strikes.
Alliance Alive, The (USA).desc:
《The Legend of Legacy》的製作者在《The Alliance Alive》中將經典 JRPG 重新演繹出來，這是一款全新的冒險遊戲，通過提供宏大的世界探索、9 位主角相互交織的故事以及精心設計的戰鬥機制，喚起了 JRPG 偉人的懷舊之情。


一千年前，惡魔入侵人類世界。他們征服了人類並創造了隔離各個領域的大屏障。世界陷入劇變，暗流誕生。人類遭到毀滅，現在惡魔統治著一個等級社會。然而，抵抗的時刻已經到來。世界即將再次改變……


獨一無二的世界


建立在一個充滿無數秘密等待發現的廣闊世界上，玩家需要在四個領域建立並聯合公會，同時與惡魔作戰。


參與獨特的戰鬥


使用“點火”系統，這是回合製戰鬥的一部分，可以讓
進行深度定制和細緻入微的遊戲玩法，以達到增強狀態
並發動毀滅性的最後一擊。

Dream Trigger 3D (USA).name: 夢想觸發器 3d
Dream Trigger 3D (USA).original_desc: Dream Trigger 3D showcases the wow factor of the 3DS like no other game. A stunning mixture of explosive graphics and nonstop action, it is a signature shooter for the system. Play as a fixer of dreams', turning nightmare landscapes into gorgeous dreamscapes in this must-have visual masterpiece for new 3DS owners.
Dream Trigger 3D (USA).desc: Dream Trigger 3D 展示了 3DS 的令人驚嘆的因素，這是其他遊戲所無法比擬的。它是爆炸性圖形和不間斷動作的驚人結合，是該系統的標誌性射擊遊戲。在這款 3DS 新用戶必備的視覺傑作中，扮演夢想的修復者，將噩夢般的風景變成華麗的夢境。

Metroid - Samus Returns (USA).name: 銀河戰士:薩姆斯歸來
Metroid - Samus Returns (USA).original_desc:
Metroid: Samus Returns is a side-scrolling action-adventure video game developed collaboratively by MercurySteam and Nintendo, with the latter also publishing it for the Nintendo 3DS handheld game console. A part of the science fiction Metroid series, the game is a reimagining of the 1991 Game Boy game Metroid II: Return of Samus, and was released worldwide on 15 September 2017. It follows series protagonist Samus Aran, who is sent by the Galactic Federation to exterminate the parasitic Metroids on their home planet of SR388.
The game features a story and structure similar to Metroid II but with new controls, visuals, and gameplay. It also introduces some features that are new to the 2D Metroid games, such as melee counterattacks, an ability to fire freely at any angle, and a selection of different abilities. The development on Samus Returns began in 2015, with longtime Metroid developer Yoshio Sakamoto producing it. The game was met with positive reception from video game journalists, who praised its visuals and improved gameplay over the original game, with many viewing it as a return to form for the series.
Metroid - Samus Returns (USA).desc:
《銀河戰士：薩姆斯歸來》是一款由 MercurySteam 和任天堂合作開發的橫向捲軸動作冒險視頻遊戲，後者還為任天堂 3DS 手持遊戲機發行了該遊戲。作為科幻小說《銀河戰士》系列的一部分，該遊戲是對 1991 年 Game Boy 遊戲《銀河戰士 II：薩姆斯歸來》的重新設計，並於 2017 年 9 月 15 日在全球發行。該遊戲講述了系列主角薩姆斯·阿蘭 (Samus Aran) 被銀河聯邦派去消滅其母星 SR388 上的寄生銀河戰士的故事。
該遊戲的故事和結構與《銀河戰士 II》類似，但具有新的控制、視覺效果和遊戲玩法。它還引入了一些 2D 銀河戰士遊戲的新功能，例如近戰反擊、任意角度自由射擊的能力以及不同能力的選擇。《薩姆斯歸來》的開發始於 2015 年，由《銀河戰士》的長期開發者坂本吉夫製作。該遊戲受到了視頻遊戲記者的積極評價，他們稱讚其視覺效果和對原版遊戲的改進，許多人將其視為該系列的回歸。

Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold - The Fafnir Kni.key: Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold - The Fafnir Knight (Europe) Decrypted
Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold - The Fafnir Kni.original_name: Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold: The Fafnir Knight
Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold - The Fafnir Kni.name: Etrian Odyssey 2 不為人知：法夫尼爾騎士
Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold - The Fafnir Kni.original_desc:
Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold - The Fafnir Knight is a continuation of the Untold spin-off series for Etrian Odyssey. This Etrian Odyssey Untold game is an upgraded and enhanced version of the original Nintendo DS game: Etrian Odyssey II: Heroes of Lagaard.

In the same line as Etrian Odyssey Untold: The Millennium Girl, this Untold game features an enhanced version of the original Nintendo DS game, which one can play through in the "Classic Mode" or can explore the mystery of the Fafnir Knight (the so-called "Untold" part) in the "Story Mode".

 Classic Mode: Customizable characters and maps, with a slight different plot compared to the new "Story Mode"

 Story Mode: Standard characters, broad and widened background stories, cutscenes & voiceacting

There are three difficulty settings possible when starting a new game: Picnic, Normal & Expert. Data is transferrable from the Classic Mode to the new Story Mode.
Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold - The Fafnir Kni.desc:
Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold - 法夫納騎士是 Etrian Odyssey 的 Untold 衍生系列的延續。這款《Etrian Odyssey Untold》遊戲是原版 Nintendo DS 遊戲《Etrian Odyssey II：拉加德英雄》的升級版和增強版。

與《Etrian Odyssey Untold: The Millennium Girl》一脈相承，這款《Untold》遊戲是原版任天堂 DS 遊戲的增強版，可以在“經典模式”中暢玩，也可以在“故事模式”中探索法夫尼爾騎士之謎（即所謂的“不為人知”部分）。

經典模式：可定制的角色和地圖，與新的“故事模式”相比，情節略有不同

故事模式：標準角色、廣泛的背景故事、過場動畫和配音

開始新遊戲時可以進行三種難度設置：野餐、普通和專家。數據可從經典模式轉移到新的故事模式。

3D Game Collection (USA).name: 3D遊戲合集
3D Game Collection (USA).original_desc:

      Play a round of Sudoku, do a relaxing puzzle or make the other player's 
      ships sink to the bottom of the sea. A grand total of 25 game types in 
      three magnificently themed worlds provide plenty of variety and lots of 
      fun.
    

    
      Accept the challenge and try to collect all the trophies. But be warned 
      - it won't be easy! Every game learns and adapts to your abilities!

3D Game Collection (USA).desc:
終於來了：eShop 上的第一個 Nintendo 3DS 遊戲合集！

終於來了：eShop 上的第一個 Nintendo 3DS 遊戲合集！


玩一輪數獨、玩一個輕鬆的謎題或製作其他玩家的遊戲

Pokemon Super Mystery Dungeon (USA).name: 神奇寶貝超級不可思議的迷宮
Pokemon Super Mystery Dungeon (USA).original_desc: The definitive Pokemon Mystery Dungeon! Prepare yourself for a grand adventure where you become a Pokemon and battle alongside Legendary and Mythical Pokemon to help save the world! Befriend Pokemon and explore ever-changing mystery dungeons with them! Players are suddenly transformed into a Pokemon and sent out to a world inhabited only by Pokemon. From a group of 20 Pokemon, including the starters from core RPG Pokemon games plus Pikachu and Riolu, you can choose your Pokemon and your partner Pokemon! Battle alongside your partner Pokemon, who will become your best friend as you investigate ever-changing dungeons. Befriend and interact with all 720 known Pokemon as you attempt to save the world from a crisis in a tale of unprecedented scale! The possibilities are limitless!
Pokemon Super Mystery Dungeon (USA).desc: 終極寶可夢不可思議的迷宮！準備好迎接一場盛大的冒險吧，你將成為一名神奇寶貝，與傳奇和神話的神奇寶貝一起戰鬥，幫助拯救世界！與神奇寶貝交朋友，與它們一起探索不斷變化的神秘地下城！玩家突然變成了神奇寶貝，並被傳送到只有神奇寶貝居住的世界。從 20 只 Pokemon 中，包括核心 RPG Pokemon 遊戲的入門者以及皮卡丘和利歐魯，您可以選擇您的 Pokemon 和您的伙伴 Pokemon！與你的伙伴口袋妖怪並肩作戰，當你調查不斷變化的地下城時，他們將成為你最好的朋友。在規模空前的故事中，嘗試將世界從危機中拯救出來，與所有 720 只已知的神奇寶貝交朋友並互動！可能性是無限的！

Dragon Ball - Fusions (USA).name: 龍珠融合
Dragon Ball - Fusions (USA).original_desc: Dragon Ball Fusions is an RPG action game that combines fighting, customization, and collection elements to bring Dragon Ball to the next level. In this new world, players will discover powerful items, find warriors who can become their allies, and build teams to bring into battle to see who the best fighters are. The battle system combines strategy and real time action to make this a fun and unique Dragon Ball experience for fans.
Dragon Ball - Fusions (USA).desc: Dragon Ball Fusions 是一款 RPG 動作遊戲，結合了戰鬥、自定義和收集元素，將 Dragon Ball 提升到了一個新的水平。在這個新世界中，玩家將發現強大的物品，尋找可以成為盟友的戰士，並組建團隊參加戰鬥，看看誰是最好的戰士。戰鬥系統結合了策略和實時動作，為粉絲們帶來有趣而獨特的龍珠體驗。

Legends of Oz - Dorothy's Return (USA).name: 綠野仙踪 - 多蘿西歸來
Legends of Oz - Dorothy's Return (USA).original_desc:
Dorothy is Back!
Oz is in Trouble again thanks to the evil Jester! A new villain named Jester showed up on the scene and started kidnapping a lot of the legends of Oz! Scarecrow, Lion and the Tin Man were all captured by his flying monkeys, and now theyre being held with others against their will! Dorothy needs to recruit some new companions to help her make it to the Emerald City. With exciting new lands of Oz to explore, you can help Dorothy and become a Legend of Oz!
Legends of Oz - Dorothy's Return (USA).desc:
多蘿西回來了！
由於邪惡的小丑，奧茲國再次陷入麻煩！一個名叫小丑的新反派出現了，並開始綁架很多奧茲國的傳奇人物！稻草人、獅子、鐵皮人都被他的飛猴抓走了，現在又被強行關押在一起！多蘿西需要招募一些新同伴來幫助她到達翡翠城。探索令人興奮的奧茲國新大陸，您可以幫助多蘿西並成為奧茲國傳奇！

Animal Crossing - New Leaf (Europe).name: 動物森友會 - 新葉
Animal Crossing - New Leaf (Europe).original_desc:
Animal Crossing: New Leaf is a social simulation game. You take on the role as the new mayor in a small village populated by animals. Game play consists of improving the village with new buildings and decorations, collecting furniture and items for your own house as well as donating fossils, fish, insects and art to the local museum.

There's more to discover than ever before in the Animal Crossingâ„¢: New Leafâ€”Welcome amiibo game! This updated version of Animal Crossingâ„¢: New Leaf adds in support for all Animal Crossing series amiibo figures and cards.
Animal Crossing - New Leaf (Europe).desc:
《動物之森：新葉》是一款社交模擬遊戲。你在一個充滿動物的小村莊里擔任新村長。遊戲包括用新的建築和裝飾來改善村莊，為自己的房子收集家具和物品，以及向當地博物館捐贈化石、魚類、昆蟲和藝術品。

《動物之森™：新葉》中有比以往更多的內容等待您探索——歡迎來到 amiibo 遊戲！《動物之森™：新葉》的更新版本增加了對所有《動物之森》系列 amiibo 人物和卡片的支持。

Fire Emblem - Awakening (Europe).name: 火焰之纹章if
Fire Emblem - Awakening (Europe).original_desc: Fire Emblem Awakening offers a unique blend of in-battle strategy, vast character customization, and lush 3D cinematic graphics that appeal to a wide range of gamers. In this game, you'll join Chrom, brother to Ylisse's empress and commander of its forces, in a fantasy world teetering on the brink of war. It's your duty to guide a team of Ylisse's finest soldiers--knights, mages, archers, and more--against the marauding Plegian bandits. To succeed, you will need to carefully choose the units you take into battle. As you lead your team through battles across maps that span entire kingdoms, your army will grow. Some characters are willing to join you quickly, while others may need more persuasion. Each character earns experience in battle, leveling up and gaining strength and abilities as they do so. It's up to you to guide their moves, choose their weapons, and direct their attacks.
Fire Emblem - Awakening (Europe).desc: 《火焰紋章覺醒》將戰鬥策略、大量角色定制和豐富的 3D 電影圖形獨特地融合在一起，吸引了廣泛的遊戲玩家。在這款遊戲中，你將與伊麗絲皇后的兄弟、軍隊的指揮官克羅姆 (Chrom) 一起，進入一個瀕臨戰爭邊緣的奇幻世界。你的職責是帶領一支由伊利斯最優秀的士兵組成的隊伍——騎士、法師、弓箭手等等——對抗掠奪成性的普雷吉亞強盜。為了取得成功，您需要仔細選擇參加戰鬥的單位。當你帶領你的團隊在跨越整個王國的地圖上進行戰鬥時，你的軍隊將會壯大。有些角色願意很快加入你，而另一些角色可能需要更多的說服。每個角色都會在戰鬥中獲得經驗，升級並獲得力量和能力。由你來引導他們的行動、選擇他們的武器並指揮他們的攻擊。

Legend of Zelda, The - A Link Between Wo.key: Legend of Zelda, The - A Link Between Worlds (Europe)
Legend of Zelda, The - A Link Between Wo.original_name: The Legend of Zelda - A Link Between Worlds
Legend of Zelda, The - A Link Between Wo.name: 塞爾達傳說 - 世界之間的聯繫
Legend of Zelda, The - A Link Between Wo.original_desc:
Two worlds collide in an all-new adventure set in the world of Super NES classic The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past. In this newly spun tale, Link transforms into a living painting to cross into a dark, parallel dimension mirroring Hyrule. Conquer the puzzles, traps, and hidden rooms of deadly dungeons to save both worlds from certain doom! 

Brought to life in 3D, this beloved, top-down world is the perfect backdrop for a sweeping new tale. Dungeons sink deep below the screen as Link and his attacks pop out, highlighting the nonstop action. The pace is faster than ever, especially since you can swap items on the Nintendo 3DS touch screen. Shoot an arrow, toss a boomerang, bomb a wall, then merge into a painting to slide between two worlds - all in a matter of seconds. With gameplay, visuals, and controls this smooth and consistent, no Zelda adventure has ever been so action-packed.
Legend of Zelda, The - A Link Between Wo.desc:
兩個世界在 Super NES 經典《塞爾達傳說：眾神的三角力量》世界中展開全新冒險。在這個新編的故事中，林克變成了一幅活生生的畫作，穿越到一個反映海拉爾的黑暗平行維度。征服致命地牢的謎題、陷阱和隱藏房間，將兩個世界從厄運中拯救出來！

這個受人喜愛的自上而下的世界以 3D 形式栩栩如生，是全新故事的完美背景。當林克和他的攻擊彈出時，地下城會深深地沉入屏幕下方，突出了不間斷的動作。節奏比以往任何時候都快，特別是因為您可以在 Nintendo 3DS 觸摸屏上交換物品。射箭、投擲迴旋鏢、轟炸牆壁，然後融入一幅畫中，在兩個世界之間滑動 - 所有這些都只需幾秒鐘。遊戲玩法、視覺效果和控制如此流暢和一致，塞爾達傳說歷險記從未如此充滿動感。

Legend of Zelda, The - Ocarina of Time 3.key: Legend of Zelda, The - Ocarina of Time 3D (Europe)
Legend of Zelda, The - Ocarina of Time 3.original_name: The Legend of Zelda - Ocarina of Time 3D
Legend of Zelda, The - Ocarina of Time 3.name: 塞尔达传说 时之笛 3D
Legend of Zelda, The - Ocarina of Time 3.original_desc: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time 3D brings a completely re-mastered version of an epic entry in the beloved The Legend of Zelda game series to Nintendos newest hand-held system, Nintendo 3DS. The game couples phenomenally enhanced graphics with stunning, glasses-free 3D visuals to bring to life the daring adventures of its hero, Link. A streamlined touch-screen interface and newly implemented motion controls provide a fresh and intuitive feel as players immerse themselves in the tale of the creation of Hyrule and the struggle for control of its all-powerful ancient relic. The game will also feature new challenges not included in the original game. The Legend of Zelda veterans can look forward to the Master Quest a second quest with revamped puzzles and redesigned dungeons that feature the same graphical and interface upgrades as the main game. The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time 3D is a masterful improvement on one of the landmark releases in video game history.
Legend of Zelda, The - Ocarina of Time 3.desc: 《塞爾達傳說：時之笛 3D》將深受喜愛的《塞爾達傳說》遊戲系列中史詩般的作品的完全重新製作版本帶到了任天堂最新的手持系統 Nintendo 3DS 上。該遊戲將顯著增強的圖形與令人驚嘆的裸眼 3D 視覺效果結合在一起，將英雄林克的大膽冒險帶入生活。流線型的觸摸屏界面和新實現的運動控制提供了一種新鮮而直觀的感覺，讓玩家沉浸在海拉魯的創造和爭奪其全能古代遺跡控制權的故事中。該遊戲還將包含原遊戲中未包含的新挑戰。《塞爾達傳說》的老玩家可以期待 Master Quest 的第二個任務，其中包含經過改進的謎題和重新設計的地下城，其圖形和界面升級與主遊戲相同。《塞爾達傳說：時之笛 3D》是對視頻遊戲歷史上具有里程碑意義的版本之一的出色改進。

Monster.original_desc: Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate (called Monster Hunter 4G in Japan) is the newest installment in the popular Monster Hunter series, which has sold more than 28 million units worldwide to date. In Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate, players will take on the role of a hunter that joins up with a traveling caravan to explore new lands and towns along the way. This grand adventure will include hundreds of quests to take on a variety of extraordinary creatures that yield valuable resources used for weapons and equipment. Launching on Nintendo 3DS, Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate represents the biggest leap forward ever for the series with more new content and exciting features than ever before. Also, for the first time ever for the Monster Hunter series on a handheld system, players will be able to join up with friends over the internet via the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection, as well as the previously available local wireless option.

Fire Emblem - Fates Birthright (USA).name: 火焰之纹章if
Fire Emblem - Fates Birthright (USA).original_desc:
A youth has grown up as one of the royal children of the glory-seeking nation of Nohr. Though their father has forbidden them to leave the castle, they still live a happy life with their four siblings. However, when they finally are sent to the outside world, it is on a mission to Hoshido, a peace-loving country that Nohr has plans to invade. There they learn that they were born to the Hoshido royal family, and were kidnapped by Nohr as an infant. A Nohr princess named Azura was taken hostage by Hoshido in retaliation, and has been living in a similar situation to the protagonist. With war looming on the horizon, Azura and the protagonist choose to side with their family in Hoshido, and defend it against the invading Nohr forces.

Birthright is one of three versions of Fire Emblem Fates, the others being Conquest and Revelation. In this version, the player controls their fully customizable avatar as they lead Hoshido's forces in strategic battles against Nohr-allied enemies. Gameplay is similar to Fire Emblem Awakening, with less challenging gameplay and the opportunity to grind for money, items, and experience in between storyline battles. In addition to the Classic and Casual modes featured in Awakening, this game contains Phoenix Mode, in which defeated allies are immediately resurrected on the following turn. Players pick one of these three modes at the start of the game, but may choose to permanently switch from Classic or Casual to a less difficult mode later on.

Supports also return from Awakening, allowing characters to build their relationships as they fight alongside each other. Two characters of the opposite sex may get married and have children once their relationship has progressed enough, and Birthright also includes the possibility of a same-sex relationship if the player chooses the female protagonist.

A feature called My Castle allows the player to build and customize a village that can contain various helpful buildings, such as shops that sell weapons or healing items. The village can be upgraded with resources collected through StreetPass, and it is also where StreetPass battles are held. Winning a StreetPass battle allows the player to recruit one of the defeated opponent units into their own army, and a shop in the village allows players to purchase other special units called Einherjard.

Players may purchase DLC that allows them to play through the Conquest and Revelation scenarios as well.
Fire Emblem - Fates Birthright (USA).desc:
一名年輕人成長為追求榮耀的諾爾國家的皇室子弟之一。儘管父親禁止他們離開城堡，但他們仍然和四個兄弟姐妹過著幸福的生活。然而，當他們最終被派往外面的世界時，卻是去星戶執行任務，這是諾爾計劃入侵的一個愛好和平的國家。在那裡，他們得知自己出生於星戶皇室，並在嬰兒時期被諾爾綁架。一位名叫阿祖拉的諾爾公主被星戶報復為人質，一直生活在與主角相似的境地。戰爭一觸即發，阿祖拉和主角選擇站在星戶的家人一邊，保衛它免受諾爾軍隊的入侵。

出生權是《火焰紋章：命運》的三個版本之一，另外兩個版本是征服和啟示。在此版本中，玩家控製完全可定制的化身，領導星戶的部隊與諾爾盟友的敵人進行戰略戰鬥。遊戲玩法與《火焰紋章覺醒》類似，但遊戲玩法的挑戰性較低，並且有機會在故事情節戰鬥之間獲取金錢、物品和經驗。除了《覺醒》的經典和休閒模式外，該遊戲還包含鳳凰模式，在該模式下，被擊敗的盟友會在下一個回合立即復活。玩家在遊戲開始時選擇這三種模式之一，但稍後可以選擇從經典或休閒模式永久切換到難度較低的模式。

支持也從覺醒中回歸，允許角色在並肩作戰時建立關係。兩個異性角色一旦關係發展到足夠的程度就可以結婚生子，而出生權還包括如果玩家選擇女主角則有同性關係的可能性。

名為“我的城堡”的功能允許玩家建造和定制一個村莊，其中可以包含各種有用的建築物，例如出售武器或治療物品的商店。村莊可以通過StreetPass收集的資源進行升級，也是StreetPass戰鬥的舉辦地。贏得一場 StreetPass 戰鬥後，玩家可以招募一個被擊敗的對手單位加入自己的軍隊，而村莊里的商店則允許玩家購買其他稱為 Einherjard 的特殊單位。

玩家可以購買 DLC，讓他們也可以玩征服和啟示場景。

Code Name - S.T.original_desc: Launch S.T.E.A.M., an elite team of steam-powered special-forces soldiers, to save the world from an alien menace. In this new blend of action and strategy, our commandos use steam power stored in special backpacks to move into position and fire an arsenal of distinct weapons. Pick your team members and load out, then use strategy to decide the best way to approach this steampunk-inspired battlefield.

Monster.Hunter.original_desc: Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate (called Monster Hunter 4G in Japan) is the newest installment in the popular Monster Hunter series, which has sold more than 28 million units worldwide to date. In Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate, players will take on the role of a hunter that joins up with a traveling caravan to explore new lands and towns along the way. This grand adventure will include hundreds of quests to take on a variety of extraordinary creatures that yield valuable resources used for weapons and equipment. Launching on Nintendo 3DS, Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate represents the biggest leap forward ever for the series with more new content and exciting features than ever before. Also, for the first time ever for the Monster Hunter series on a handheld system, players will be able to join up with friends over the internet via the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection, as well as the previously available local wireless option.
